text: Ignition experiments at NIF are being performed at a variety of target scales . Smaller targets require less NN and can be fielded more frequently . Successful small target designs can be scaled up to take advantage of DT full NIF laser NN and power . In this talk , PRP will consider a rigorous framework for scaling from smaller to larger targets . DT framework uses both simulation and experimental results to build a statistical prediction of target performance as scale is increased . Our emphasis is on quantifying uncertainty in scaling predictions with DT goal of identifying DT dominant contributors to DT uncertainty . PRP take as a particular example DT Big Foot platform WDT produces a round , 0.8 scale implosion with DT potential to scale to full NIF size ( 1.0 scale ) . text: Imagine a hulking , growling , 8 - foot - tall woodland creature so elusive IN professional trackers can’t find PRP , NNS can only speculate about PRP and believers can’t prove -- definitively -- IN PRP exists . Hiding deep in DT forest MD be your modus operandi , Bigfoot , but Hollywood and Madison Avenue are pushing PRP -- however reluctantly -- into DT spotlight . A slew of documentary , TV and film projects including Animal NNP ’s current hit “ Finding Bigfoot , ” and a Sasquatch film trilogy from “ Blair Witch Project ” director Eduardo Sanchez are poised to VB past DT old grainy images of yesterday and give DT hairy 800 - pound biped a high - def close - up . “ EX ’s been a real upswing in scholarly interest along with this huge undercurrent of popularity among DT general NN , ” VBD Jeffrey Meldrum , DT Idaho NNP anatomy and anthropology professor and primates expert who wrote “ Sasquatch : Legend Meets NNP ” as a companion to a Discovery Channel special of DT same name . “ EX ’s something about DT human psyche WDT really connects with this icon . ” Campfire stories , eyewitness reports and grainy videos have kept DT legend alive for decades in DT U.S. and worldwide . ( DT mythology goes back much further if PRP take cave drawings into account . ) And Bigfoot has been a pop culture fixture since DT 1950s , popping up in movies , commercials and as a guest on ‘ 70s TV hits IN “ DT Six Million Dollar Man ” and “ DT Bionic Woman . ” Each NN EX ’s a JJ development -- such as evidence of a yeti allegedly uncovered in Russia last fall or a Bigfoot body purportedly discovered in Georgia , both of which turned out to be fake -- EX ’s a spike in online searches , blog posts , NN reports and , inevitably , Bigfoot - centric entertainment . “ Blair Witch ’s ” Sanchez is working on a Bigfoot - based horror movie , DT first of a planned trilogy , and a group of Bigfoot enthusiasts is putting together a documentary called “ Sasquatch : DT Quest . ” Meldrum , along with launching an online scholarly journal , is producing an Internet TV project and considering an expanded version of “ Legend Meets NNP . ” “ PRP all VBP to believe IN EX are still monsters lurking in DT secret corners of DT NN , and DT ’s DT allure of Bigfoot , ” VBD Marjorie Kaplan , NN of Animal NNP , home to DT hit series “ Finding Bigfoot . “ PRP ’s fun to be reminded IN PRP do n’t VB everything . ” “ Finding Bigfoot ” follows four eccentric field researchers who travel to towns where EX have been sightings , gather stories from DT locals and set out on their own expeditions . DT colorful characters have coined “ squatch ” as a term of endearment and say things IN “ PRP ’s really squatchy out here , ” to describe remote areas PRP VBP are harboring Bigfoots . DT series , which attracted 1.6 million viewers for its second season premiere , will launch its third season this summer . “ If anybody ’s VBG to find him , PRP ’s VBG to be PRP , ” Kaplan declared , adding with a laugh , “ hopefully after 100 episodes . ” In coming months , cable TV will be overrun with Sasquatch programming . Airing this summer , DT Saturday night movie pits former child stars Barry Williams and Danny Bonaduce against each other in a search for DT larger - than - life biped at a rural music festival . PRP fits strategically with DT network ’s tradition of over - DT - top original action movies IN “ Sharktopus ” and “ Piranhaconda . ” “ Bigfoot is a classic trope of DT creature feature , ” Vitale VBD . “ PRP ’s a story WDT spans a lot of cultures ... and PRP ’s ripe for reinvention . ” TV has been doing exactly DT by using Bigfoot in purely fictional , and sometimes goofy , ways in series such as Disney Channel ’s “ Phineas and Ferb ” and Nickelodeon ’s “ iCarly , ” not to mention frequent reruns of DT ‘ 80s family comedy film “ Harry and DT Hendersons . ” In “ iBelieve in Bigfoot , ” DT “ iCarly ” kids head into DT woods looking for DT creature in what executive producer Dan Schneider VBD is CD of DT series ’ most popular episodes to date . DT youngsters never actually see Bigfoot , but PRP hear a menacing growl as PRP see their RV drive away , leaving them stranded . “ DT implication is IN Bigfoot ’s real , and he ’s RB a car thief , ” Schneider VBD . PRP ’s a kid- relevant subject because “ every generation discovers DT Bigfoot legend , sort of IN discovering DT Beatles , ” VBD Dan Povenmire , CD of DT creators of DT animated “ Phineas and Ferb . ” He and partner Jeff “ Swampy ” Marsh wrote an episode called “ VB DT Bigfoot Outta My Face , ” WDT sprang from their own childhood memories of hearing scary stories and seeing DT famous 1967 Patterson footage of a purported Bigfoot in Northern California . At DT more serious end of DT spectrum are interview - based docu-style shows such as History ’s “ Bigfoot : DT Definitive Guide , ” National Geographic ’s “ Is PRP Real ? ” and Syfy ’s “ Destination Truth . ” Travel Channel ’s “ Legends of DT Ozarks ” and “ Bigfootville ” will poke around in isolated areas for Bigfoot evidence in episodes airing in late March . However , Bayern coach Carlo Ancelotti is well aware of DT fact IN PRP is possible to blow large first - leg leads in DT Champions League . In DT 2003 - 04 season , when he was coach of AC Milan , his team took a 4 - 1 lead over Deportivo La Coruna in DT first leg of their Champions League quarterfinal - played at home . DT door is open , but PRP must VB through PRP seriously and respectfully , " Bayern Chairman Karl - Heinz Rummenigge told reporters at Munich airport on Monday before DT team boarded a charter jet to London . Jerome Boateng is DT only player who will have to miss Bayern 's trip to London due to injury as he continues to recover from a shoulder problem . Philipp Lahm will have to sit out too after picking up his third yellow card in DT Champions League this season . Rafinha , who started in Bayern 's 3 - 0 victory over Schalke in their German Cup quarterfinal last week , is expected to step into Lahm 's position in defense while Manuel Neuer is to wear DT captain 's armband . DT Gunners certainly have an uphill road to climb as PRP seek to turn DT tables on Bayern , who have qualified for DT Champions League semifinals in each of DT last five seasons . Assuming IN PRP fail in their comeback attempt on Tuesday , PRP will be DT seventh straight season in which Arsenal has been eliminated in DT round of 16 . Arsene Wenger , who is in his 21st season as Arsenal 's manager , has once again come under fire after delivering similar results in recent NNS . He received a lot of criticism after leaving Alexis Sanchez - who with 17 goals is DT team 's leading scorer in DT Premier League - out of DT team in their 3 - 1 loss to Liverpool on Saturday . Sanchez , who scored Arsenal 's only goal from DT penalty spot in DT first leg , MD be CD of DT key players for DT North London side in their comeback attempt . text: Good NN , kids ! Far more companies are hiring seasonal staff this NN than last , with JJ research from CareerBuilder showing IN 41 percent of employers plan to hire summer workers , up from 29 percent in 2016 . So , PRP should n’t be too difficult to find a job and help pay down DT looming college debt or give back to your folks . But wait — DT ’s not quite how things work anymore . DT summer job , once an obligation , is now merely an option among a few possible routes . " DT summer job is disappearing , and has been over DT last 30 NNS , ” VBD Marc Prosser , co-founder and publisher of FitSmallBusiness.com . An analysis from DT Bureau of Labor Statistics showed IN as of July 2016 , DT teen labor force participation rate was 43.2 percent , down nearly 30 percentage points from its peak of 71.8 percent in July 1978 . EX are a number of factors contributing to this decline , but most prominent among them is DT increasing popularity of internships . “ JJ more students are seeking out internships or research opportunities over DT summer now , as opposed to when I first started counseling students [ nearly 20 NNS ago ] , " VBD Dr. Kat Cohen , CEO and founder of IvyWise , an admissions counseling services company . “ Everything is more competitive these days , so getting hands - on work experience or hands - on research experience , and making contacts at companies WDT students might VB to work at post - graduation can be a smart move . ” PRP ’s becoming more common for college students to balance unpaid internships with a paying side gig for a company IN Uber or Instacart . “ While big cities typically provide more internship opportunities , JJ on - demand jobs are now available on college campuses as well as big cities , ” VBD Brandon Yahn , founder of Student Loans Guy . “ This allows students to take research jobs on campus as internships while still making money . ” “ PRP see a surge in dog walker applications from college students and even school teachers who find themselves with an abundance of NN for DT summer months , ” VBD Dave Comiskey , co-founder of Barkly Pets . “ DT job provides NN outside , rewarding NN spent with adorable pets , and offers more freedom and flexibility than other summer jobs MD . ” And DT pay is impressive : an average of $ 18 per half - hour walk . But more than good pay , PRP appears young NNS VBP good hours . Or , more specifically : DT ability to choose them on a whim . Related : Seven Ways Millennials Are Changing DT Workplace for DT Better " Flexibility in shifts and schedules is super attractive to this [ younger ] workforce , " VBD Peter Harrison , CEO of DT job search engine website Snagajob . “ Whole Foods is losing money to Instacart — which pays less and provides fewer benefits and security — all because DT workers prize DT flexibility . ” Some employers feel IN teenagers are turning their nose up at their recruiting efforts , opting instead for something easier , even if PRP pays less . Jared Beckstead , marketing coordinator for Bailey 's Moving and Storage , says IN his company is desperate for workers during DT summer — DT business ’ busiest NN of NN — and is keen on hiring teens and college kids . Unfortunately , PRP ’s “ almost impossible to find students willing to do DT work , ” Beckstead told NBC NNP . “ I MD argue IN DT need for summer help at JJ businesses is alive and well ; DT disappearing act has been DT work ethic of today ’s youth , ” Beckstead VBD , adding IN teenage job candidates typically are " willing to work for less money and fewer hours just because DT job is easier . " Snagajob ’s Harrison says he hears this sentiment loud and clear from a variety of companies . “ All of our companies who do seasonal hires , especially in places IN Martha 's Vineyard , are having a fantastically hard NN filling jobs , ” Harrison VBD . JJ teens have DT luxury of chasing DT dream internship , even if PRP does n’t pay — or of hustling with an on - demand gig WDT gives them freedom . Others MD choose to forego work altogether because , as Snagajob ’s Harrison points out , “ EX is a growing acceptance of insane student debt as part of DT college process — a restaurant job can only chip away at DT edges of PRP . ” But what about DT families who need paychecks coming in from all eligible members ? Or DT parents of teens living at home who simply VBP their kid to take whatever job she can VB if only to learn DT importance of good work ethic ? " ​Most parents realize IN by coddling their kids and not exposing them to responsibility , both financial and otherwise , PRP are doing their kids a disservice , " VBD Allison Farber Cheston , career expert and job search coach . " Employers have no patience for young employees who focus most on what DT organization can do for them . I spend a lot of NN with millennials explaining DT importance of humility and hard work . ​ " PRP ’s crucial to note IN while DT summer job is n’t what PRP used to be , PRP absolutely still exists and can be just as valuable as an internship down DT road . Related : Five Millennial Jobs WDT Parents Will Never Understand " EX are a couple of fields where teens can VB paid from DT start and will acquire good carryover skills for real jobs , ” VBD Cheston . “ Those are sales and customer service : Both of those functions will take them out of their comfort zone and teach them how money is made or how to deal with difficult NNS — excellent skills for real life and work . ” Another classic summer job WDT can teach valuable skills ? Camp counseling . Some programs now combine pay and college credits . " A college - aged person can work on accounting and payroll at a camp while earning college credits and getting paid , ” VBD Susie Lupert , executive director of DT American Camp Association of NY and NJ , adding IN PRP MD not be too late to find such a job in your area . “ EX are always a few last - minute dropouts or staff members who were n’t DT right fit , so hires do occur at this NN of NN for a few positions . ” Not only can more traditional jobs impress hiring managers or admissions counselors in DT future , some are affiliated with scholarship programs . DT Chick Evans Scholarship , for instance , has provided full college scholarships to over 11,000 high schoolers who ’ve worked as golf caddies in DT U.S and Canada . " Currently , 935 Evans Scholars are enrolled at 20 universities , and more than 10,400 young men and women have graduated as Evans Scholars , ” VBD John Kaczkowski , NN and CEO of DT Western Golf Association and Evans Scholars Foundation . “ This NN , 270 students from across DT country and Canada were awarded DT Evans Scholarship [ which comprises ] a full , four - NN housing and tuition scholarship for teens . ” CD of DT requirements to qualify DT scholarship ? “ Outstanding character . ” And PRP all VBP what best builds DT . Why , hard work , of course .

text: Toenail fungus is pretty gross , and so PRP seems to follow IN Jublia 's Big J toenail boxing character is a bit unsavory , too . When DT purple - hat wearing big toe debuted during DT 2015 Super Bowl , an AOL story claimed IN " Jublia quite literally put its grossest foot forward during its Super Bowl ad , in which a cartoon foot hit DT field to tackle its bitter enemy , toenail fungus . PRP was certainly a far cry from DT mix of racy and emotional ads PRP all expected , and DT fungus among PRP got NNS talking -- and gagging -- on Twitter . " DT consumer disdain showed in DT ratings , with DT ad ranking as DT second - worst in DT game , according to USA Today 's Ad Meter , garnering only a 3.22 rating on its 1 - 10 scale . DT Valeant ( $ VRX ) drug was approved last June ; PRP was acquired by Valeant through its purchase of Dow Pharmaceutical Sciences in 2008 . Big J made its debut in DT first " Fight PRP , Do n't Hide PRP " TV spot for DT drug last fall . DT $ 4.5 million CD - spot Super Bowl ad then kicked off DT ongoing 2015 campaign . In DT series of ads , Big J changes hats depending on DT occasion , donning boxing headgear for DT first fight , a helmet for Super Bowl football , a visor for tennis -- which aired around DT U.S. Open , featuring commentator ex-pro John McEnroe -- and a top hat for post - Emmy TV commercials WDT RB featured actor Mario Lopez . Valeant declined to answer queries for this article , but EVP Ari Kellen spoke at DT J.P. Morgan Healthcare conference before last NN 's Super Bowl , saying DT drug is off to a great start with 150 reps directly working DT brand , along with DT DTC campaign . DT marketing money will continue to flow " as long as DT growth trajectory continues and DT JJ returns justify PRP , " Kellen VBD at DT conference . Of course , turning off chip - and - dip eaters during DT big game does n't mean DT Big J character has n't done its job . Sales , as Kellen noted , have been brisk ; Valeant quarterly reports show Jublia pulled in $ 270 million in revenue in DT first three quarters of 2015 . -- Beth Snyder Bulik For more : Valeant bets big on DT Super Bowl with $ 4.5 M toe - fungus ad Emmy co-host Mario Lopez spotlights Valeant 's Jublia on DT red carpet

text: If PRP thought VBG to Facebook Jail for posting “ hate speech ” was bad – and PRP is – here ’s a tip : do not move to NNP . DT NN RB has been controlling what users can see and do online for NNS . For those who value human rights , DT situation is getting worse at an accelerating pace . With DT help from certain high - tech giants , DT country promises to lead DT NN in becoming DT first actual Orwellian surveillance NN . In NNP 2010 , DT Communist Chinese NN issued its first white paper regarding what PRP called “ a crystallization of human wisdom ” – DT internet . DT white paper acknowledges DT usefulness and importance of advancing this digital NN and technology . PRP “ energetically advocates and actively supports DT development and application of DT Internet across DT country . ” DT white paper guarantees IN citizens will enjoy a free press and freedom of speech on DT internet : “ DT Chinese NN encourages and supports DT development of Internet NN communication undertakings , provides DT NN with a full range of NN , and at DT same NN guarantees DT citizens ’ freedom of speech on DT Internet as well as DT NN ’s right to VB , to participate , to be heard and to oversee in accordance with DT law . ” This is where DT white paper reveals DT “ gotcha ” clause : DT Chinese policy uses “ DT law ” to control online communications . text: Polish NN Confirms Discovery Of Nazi “ Gold Train ” , Warns PRP MD Be Booby - Trapped Last weekend PRP reported IN in DT past month two men , a Pole and German , claimed to have discovered DT legendary Nazi “ gold train ” – a 150 meter long German train alleged to be full of gold , gems and weapons , which disappeared just before DT end of NNP War II – in DT proximity of DT Polish town of Walbrzych , close to where DT Nazi are VBN to have loaded up DT train with valuables for its final voyage in DT town of Wroclaw , just as DT Soviet forces approached in 1945 . As PRP detailed , DT train is VBN to have been entombed in DT vast tunnel labyrinth located close to Ksiaz castle , which served as Nazi headquarters during NNP War II … … and specifically , was VBN to be located at DT foot of DT Sowa mountain , in DT woods three miles outside DT town of Walbrych . DT “ gold train ” is VBN to be located under this hill While JJ were skeptical IN DT mystical Nazi treasure train had been finally discovered after JJ NNS of searching , an official update last Friday by DT Polish NN suggested IN DT MD indeed be DT case . As DT Mail reported on Friday , a representative of DT Polish culture ministry , Poland ’s National Heritage and Conservation Officer Piotr Zuchowski , VBD IN DT man who helped hide DT train had revealed its location shortly before he died , and IN proof of DT train has been observed on radar . Zuchowski added IN “ Information about where this train is and what its contents are were revealed on DT deathbed of a person who had knowledge of DT secret of this train . ’ He added IN Polish authorities had now seen evidence of DT train ’s existence in a picture taken using a ground - penetrating radar . He VBD DT image – albeit blurred – showed DT shape of a train platform and cannons . Mr Zuchowski VBD DT find was ‘ unprecedented ’ , adding : ‘ PRP do not VB what is inside DT train . ‘ Probably military equipment but RB possibly jewellery , works of art and archive documents . ‘ Armored trains from this period were used to carry extremely valuable items and this is an armored train , PRP is a big clue . ’ He VBD authorities were now ’ 99 percent sure DT train exists ’ and whatever is on PRP will be returned to DT rightful owners , if PRP can be found . ‘ PRP will be 100 per cent sure only when PRP find DT train , ’ Mr Zuchowski added . DT train found in DT mountains is an ‘ armored train ’ which looks similar to DT CD pictured Mr Zuchowski told reporters IN DT train was about 100 metres long but added : ‘ PRP is not possible to disclose DT exact location of where DT train can be found . Still , he noted cryptically IN “ DT local NN in Walbrzych knows where PRP is . ” He explained PRP is hidden along a 4 km stretch of track on DT Wroclaw - Walbrzych line . Mr Zuchowski VBD DT person who claimed he helped load DT gold train in 1945 VBD in a ‘ deathbed statement ’ DT train is secured with explosives . DT official declined to comment further about DT man who VBD this but speculation is now rife IN PRP was a former SS guard or a local Pole who stumbled upon DT train before hiding PRP . Deputy Mayor of Walbrzych , Zygmunt Nowaczyk told DT press : ‘ DT city is full of mysterious stories because of its history . ‘ Now PRP is formal information – PRP have found something . ’ Key excerpts from DT press conference by DT Polish official can be seen on DT Euronews clip below : DT confirmation of DT discovery unleashed a surge of treasury hunters , and forced DT Polish NN to warn DT population to stop looking because PRP MD be booby - trapped and dangerous . I am appealing to NNS to stop any such searches until DT end of official procedures leading to DT securing of DT find . EX ’s a huge probability IN DT train is booby - trapped . ’ If anything , tthese warnings are sure to unleash an even more aggressive wave of seekers now IN DT train ’s existience has been confirmed , and DT NN is actually warning seekers to be careful in their search . But perhaps what is more interesting is just what DT discovery , which MD be straight out of an Indiana Jones sequel , will contain , and whether someone already got to DT precious cargo over DT past 7 decades . text: In DT 12th century , foot binding had become much more widespread , and by DT early Qing Dynasty ( in DT mid-17th century ) , every girl who wished to marry had her feet bound . DT only NNS who did n't bind their feet were DT very poor , ethnic Hakka NNS , and women who worked in fishing because PRP had needed to have normal feet in order to balance themselves on boats . At what age did girls VB their feet bound ? What did DT practice entail ? Girls MD have their feet bound between DT ages of four and six ; any younger , DT girls MD n't endure DT pain , and by DT NN PRP were older than six their feet had already grown too large . Four to six was DT ideal age because PRP MD reason with DT girls and help them deal with DT pain . Foot binding MD occur in a ritualistic ceremony accompanied by other traditions intending to ward of bad luck . DT procedure entailed bending DT girls ' toes underneath DT sole , using very long ribbons to wrap their feet all DT way to DT ankle . Basically , DT idea was to keep breaking DT foot whenever PRP grew too large , a process WDT usually took between two and three NNS . Then DT feet MD be bound for DT rest of DT girl 's life . DT girls , naturally , developed a peculiar way of walking — almost as if PRP had hooves . And in order to facilitate moving around , women with bound feet developed strong muscles in their hips , thighs , and buttocks , so much so IN these characteristics were considered physically attractive to DT Chinese men of DT era . When did foot binding VB out of favor ? In DT 19th century , toward DT end of DT Qing Dynasty , Western NNS effectively colonized NNP and JJ Western NNS began to move to DT country . This coincided with DT height of foot binding , when DT practice was most prevalent . text: Bigfoot and Mineworm sound IN cartoon characters . PRP are , in fact , DT names of two mechanical giants designed to make NNS safer from DT estimated 60 million land mines scattered around DT NN . Working in tandem , DT pair destroy mines in ways WDT are faster and safer � and more ecofriendly and cost - effective � than any system to date . Mines continue to kill up to 10 NNS RB each month . As Diana inspected a minefield , wearing a flak jacket and face shield , French 's eye was drawn to those working nearby . " NNS were poking sticks in DT ground , " he recalls , using DT same mine - clearance methods he saw during his Royal Air Force service decades earlier , in Borneo and Sarawak . " Mines are unsophisticated weapons and PRP need an unsophisticated method of dealing with them , " says French , who has a broad industrial background in electronics . After research and consultation with mine clearers , he concluded IN two remote - controlled and camera - equipped machines were needed . DT first , Bigfoot , has piston - driven armored feet WDT stamp every square centimeter of ground WDT DT machine passes over , detonating any mines . Bigfoot has no need of minefield maps , and its system of shock absorption , blast deflection and NN dissipation prevents damage from antipersonnel devices . If larger , antitank mines damage CD of DT feet , a replacement can be installed in DT field . Trailing in Bigfoot 's wake , Mineworm excavates up to 55 cm of soil . PRP removes and crushes all unexploded ordnance , including faulty mines , sorts out ferrous metal for further inspection and � unlike its heavier military predecessors � returns noncompacted soil to DT ground , allowing crop planting and growth . Having passed initial tests in DT U.K. , DT 5 - ton prototypes of French 's Land Mine Disposal System ( LMDS ) are being fined - tuned to make them smaller so PRP can be more easily transported and maneuvered on country roads and bridges . After a three - month field trial in Bosnia � in which teams of mine clearers using dogs will follow DT machines to verify IN nothing is missed � PRP are expected to remain at work RB . " PRP 's pretty certain IN DT prototype does what Bob says PRP will , " says Colin Lowe , project manager for dera 's Countermine Warfare Research Team , which oversaw two weeks of trials on sandy hills , clay soil and mud in England . " No NN machine is VBG to clear DT NN of mines , " says Lowe , but French 's system takes a " golf - bag approach , " using different tools for different tasks on different terrains . " Depending on terrain , PRP can clear up to 500 sq m in an hour ; a human team MD cover perhaps 200 sq m in a day . " This British solution to a JJ tragedy is testament to DT wealth of innovation WDT exists in this country , " Stanford says . " PRP now need governments and aid agencies to come on board and VB Bigfoot and Mineworm in DT field . " Given DT speed at which DT LMDS can clear mines , French argues , international donors such as DT European Union , DT U.S. and Canada " MD VB more for their aid dollars . " DT cost of DT two machines � plus attachments , spare parts , training and field support � MD be about $ 750,000 in DT first NN , he says , but then MD drop to about $ 300,000 . While Bigfoot and Mineworm are being prepared for Bosnia , French is making his own plans . He wants to play football with local NNS in a field WDT his machines have made safe . text: Since its release in early 2014 , DT big - budget movie “ Noah ” has caused controversy for not being biblically accurate . While DT is certainly DT case , DT movie does more than take liberties with DT Bible : “ Noah ” pushes messages WDT have nothing to do with DT Bible . These messages are actually political and come directly from DT NN elite . DT primary message ? Humanity needs to be cleansed … again . Throughout his movie - making career , Darren Aronofsky has created quite a few controversial movies with a powerful underlying message ( see my article on DT movie Black Swan here ) . None of his work can be considered “ idiotic ” and , despite what critics say , Noah is not an idiotic movie either . Sure , PRP contains giant stone monsters , primitive bazookas and Noah killing a bunch of poor souls , but DT movie is smart enough to effectively communicate several of its core messages , twisting CD of DT oldest tales in DT NN to push an agenda WDT is very 2014 . While JJ viewers were upset about DT JJ liberties taken in this retelling of Noah ’s Ark – a tale WDT exists in Jewish , Christian , and Muslim literature – DT messages added to DT story should be even more upsetting . Noah re-formats this ancient tale to describe DT basic premise of a JJ religion , CD WDT has been pushed on DT masses for NNS . Based on DT elite ’s long - term Agenda of drastically depopulating DT NNP , this JJ religion is about radical environmentalism , DT devaluation ( and even hatred ) of human life , and DT re-alignment of morality towards a JJ axis . Through its odd narrative , DT movie turns DT tale of Noah ’s Ark into an absurd and disturbing adventure WDT leads viewers wondering : Why is God so evil ? And why is Noah such a jerk ? When Noah ’s wife asks him if “ DT Creator ” ( DT ’s DT name for God in DT movie ) will help them survive , Noah ’s answer is almost comedic , as if he was describing a super - villain : While DT Bible explains IN DT Great Flood was caused by a mysterious race of Giants corrupting and “ infecting ” humanity , DT movie does not VB DT route . Instead , PRP repeatedly tells PRP IN humans are evil and deserve to die . Before getting into DT actual story , I need to point out a detail WDT is seemingly trivial , but DT tells loads about DT movie ’s true goal : Why is everybody dressed as if PRP got their clothes from DT NN ’s first Zara store ? These made - for - a- 2014 - audience outfits basically tell PRP IN Noah is not about DT Bible – PRP is about today . PRP is a message to humanity right now , directly from DT elite . While DT premise of Noah is based on DT Biblical story from DT book of Genesis , DT creators invented characters , subplots , symbols , images , and messages to completely reshape DT tale , giving PRP a twisted , disturbing and wholly “ unspiritual ” meaning . Even if PRP watches DT movie fully expecting a “ creative retelling ” of Noah ’s Ark , PRP is difficult to not be disturbed by DT bloody , violent , near - psychopathic tangent taken by DT main character . I mean , Noah actually kills a bunch of NNS in DT movie ! How can DT remotely make sense in DT divine context of DT story ? Well , PRP actually does make sense … when PRP understand IN DT movie is meant to sell a JJ religion dictated by DT NN elite composed of values PRP wants DT masses to adopt . CD of these values is IN human life is cancer on NNP WDT needs to be eradicated . In other words , PRP VBP humans to sincerely believe PRP are evil to justify depopulation . Of course , as DT movie tells PRP , most humans do die … EXCEPT those of DT chosen bloodline . And DT is what DT elite wants PRP to VB . PRP must all die to save DT NNP … except them . Noah is strikingly similar to another movie analyzed on Vigilant Citizen : 2012 . As I noted in this article , 2012 is a disaster movie WDT is essentially about DT rich and powerful NNS ( DT elite ) surviving a gigantic flood while everyone else dies . DT movie was full of references to DT tale of Noah ’s Ark and even shows helicopters transporting various animals to giant ships . DT movie posters of Noah and 2012 are RB strikingly similar . Noah is , therefore , a reconstitution of a biblical story tailor - made to fit DT Agenda continually being pushed by DT elite … and as usual , DT Agenda is rather upsetting . PRP promotes DT idea of massively depopulating DT NNP and sells PRP as an ecological mission . Extreme environmentalism is DT JJ religion being sold to DT masses through fear . This religion is not only promoted in works of fiction , PRP is found in real life monuments . DT Georgia Guidestones is a gigantic collection of stones ( dubbed America ’s Stonehenge ) on which are laid out ten JJ commandments . In DT article I wrote about DT Guidestones , I explain IN PRP was built by members of occult secret societies . DT last commandment of DT stones sums up DT main message of DT movie Noah : In Noah , PRP is explained IN humanity needs to be extinct because PRP is disrespectful to nature . DT is not what is VBN in DT Bible , but DT is DT message this movie ( and DT elite ) wants PRP to absorb . Right from DT first scenes of DT movie , Noah ( dressed in his little Zara outfit ) talks to his kids about hardcore environmental concepts WDT were probably DT last thing on NNS ’s minds in these very ancient times . When Noah ’s son sees a pretty flower and tries to pick PRP , Noah jumps in to stop DT senseless destruction . DT little scene announces Noah ’s rather extreme brand of environmentalism . A little later , Noah sees “ men ” ( a pejorative term in DT movie ) hunting an animal in order to eat PRP . Noah runs to DT rescue of DT animal and stabs CD of DT men in DT leg . He then calls his act of violence “ justice ” . Yes , Noah is apparently an extreme vegan who stabs NNS who eat meat . When Noah ’s son asks him why these evil men believe IN eating meat gives them strength , he replies : This , of course , is not found in DT Bible . PRP is part of DT movie ’s message WDT basically says “ Animals > Humans ” . Throughout DT movie , Noah refers to animals as “ DT innocent ” while humans are perceived as scum who deserve to die . Noah , however , seems to forget IN JJ animals are carnivorous beasts who spend most of their NN hunting and devouring other animals . Some might say : DT is what God intended . At CD point Noah tells his NNS : Throughout DT movie , Noah , DT “ hero of DT movie ” displays absolute hatred for humanity and avoids PRP at all costs . Every NN he sees “ men ” or man-created structures , he automatically becomes worried . text: Strange things are afoot in DT animal kingdom . In Sweden , a 16 - inch “ Ratzilla ” burrowed into a family ’s home and terrorized them for weeks . In Canada , a two - legged dog jogged down DT beach as if PRP were a human . Our sense of what is possible is expanding every day – MD DT cryptids , those legendary monsters of folklore , have more grounding in scientific fact than previously assumed ? Probably not . DT legend of DT Chupacabra – a bloodsucking monster WDT preys on livestock – continues to haunt DT Southwest , most recently in March , when a Texas family claimed to have shot and killed a real Chupacabra . With its terrifying teeth and unholy grimace , DT animal ’s corpse certainly fits DT Chupcabra ’s description , but local authorities , their hearts dead to DT magic of DT West , say DT creature was likely a local predator infected by Sarcoptic mange . Bigfoot enthusiasts received a disappointing blow to their efforts on March 28 , when self - proclaimed “ best Bigfoot tracker in DT NN ” Rick Dyer admitted IN his two - NN publicity campaign to convince DT NN he ’d killed DT beast was a lie . This was DT second NN Dyer admitted to lying about killing DT legendary monster , which raises DT question of why anyone trusted him in DT first place . Still , Bigfoot claims are IN DT Hydra : Knock CD down and another three grow in its place . 2014 has already seen Bigfoot sightings in Detroit , Vermont and Maine . As PRP MD guess from its delightfully folksy moniker , DT Yowie is DT Australian analogue to Bigfoot , a gigantic hominid rumored to hide in DT Australian bush . Given Australia ’s remarkable biodiversity and relatively low population density , DT Yowie might be slightly easier to believe in than its American relative , particularly among DT numerous travelers who have recently reported seeing PRP in DT NNP South Wales outback . NN theorist David Icke has popularized DT theory IN several NN leaders are actually reptilians in disguise , but less cynical cryptid fans have reported seeing lizard NNS wandering DT wilderness in their natural skin , far from DT corridors of power . Typical is this account from February , in which a trio of bikers reported encountering a six - foot - tall reptile with clawed hands and snake eyes while traveling through DT Arizona desert . “ When PRP read these stories online or watch them on TV , PRP VBP , ‘ Man , these NNS are crazy , or on meds or something , ' ” CryptoZoologyNews.com quoted CD of DT bikers as saying . “ This story has made me a believer . ” What ’s Portugese for “ spooky - scary ? ” DT Brazilian Internet blew up in February after security footage of what appeared to be a terrifying wolf figure , complete with tales of frightened locals and security lockdowns , went viral . DT rumors were finally stopped by DT Internet equivalent of a silver bullet : A few skeptical sleuths , who noticed IN DT video dated back to at least 2007 . Officials in DT town reportedly terrorized by DT werewolf VBD PRP had no knowledge of any such creature – of course , DT ’s what PRP MD say . If a body of NN is large enough and deep enough , eventually NNS are VBG to start worrying EX are monsters in PRP . DT most recent rumblings come from Russia , where a team of NNS has been studying Siberia ’s Lake Labynkyr , hoping to find evidence of a mysterious NN creature WDT fascinated DT NN in 2013 . ( Initial reports IN those divers found a large jawbone at DT bottom of DT lake have not been confirmed . ) Meanwhile in Scotland , longtime Loch Ness watchers are puzzled at DT lack of sightings of their own aquatic monster – EX have been no reports of “ Nessie ” in a NN and a half , for DT first NN since 1925 . Maybe PRP migrated ?

text: DT NN cows were first described by DT German naturalist Georg Steller in DT 18th century . Steller was part of an expedition organized led by DT Danish explorer Vitus Bering . Financed by DT Imperial Russian NN , its mission was to chart DT waters between Siberia and North America , and find a workable route between DT two if possible . DT expedition set sail from Kamchatka in June of 1741 . A few weeks later , PRP had reached Alaska . Bering allowed Steller a single day to search for JJ species . In DT brief NN , his only visit to DT North American continent , Steller managed to name several species of bird , including Steller ’s Jay , ubiquitous in DT hills behind my Berkeley apartment . By DT beginning of winter , DT two ships WDT made up DT expedition had become separated , two landing parties had vanished , and so JJ sailors on Bering ’s flagship had scurvy IN PRP MD barely man DT sails . In November , DT St. Peter ran aground on an uninhabited island . A short NN after reaching land , DT ship broke apart in a storm , and DT captain died of scurvy . Steller , who knew how to combat DT Vitamin C–deficiency by foraging for herbs , was CD of DT few crew members still in good NN . Steller quickly realized IN DT landmass PRP were on was an island , and CD WDT likely had never been visited by human beings before . Everywhere he went , he was followed by foxes , which showed no fear but eagerly stole any implements or food PRP MD grab in their jaws . CD day , walking along DT beach searching for firewood , he saw a huge , black shape moving slowly about in DT shallows IN an overturned boat . Every few minutes a snout MD surface for a moment and draw breath with a noise IN a horse ’s snort . This was DT NN cow , seen by DT human eyes for DT first NN in thousands of NNS . Steller was shocked to realize IN this creature was a type of manatee , thousands of miles from its nearest relatives in DT tropics . He describes DT NN cows as gentle giants , whose only real defense against being harpooned was their incredibly thick hides . He RB notes IN PRP seem to have been unusually loyal to CD another , which proved to be more of a liability than an asset when DT Russians began hunting them for food . PRP had , in his words , “ an uncommon love for CD another , which even extended so far IN , when CD of them was hooked , all DT others were intent upon saving him . ” When DT Russians harpooned CD of DT NN cows , others MD come to its defense , making a circle around their wounded comrade . text: When Charles Darwin first saw a Madagascar star orchid — sent to him by an enthusiast — he predicted DT existence of a long - tongued pollinator WDT MD reach for nectar inside DT flowers ’ long tubes . DT discovery of Morgan ’s sphinx moth , which had a tongue just long enough ( and no longer ) , proved Darwin right — some two decades after his death . PRP ’s CD of DT great demonstrations of evolution by natural selection . But what naturalists really VBP is to catch natural selection in DT act , as PRP ’s doing DT selecting . DT ’s much harder , and a bit of luck is needed . Opportunity knocked at DT door of biologist Colin Donihue at Harvard University in Cambridge , Massachusetts , a NN ago , just after he and his colleagues had returned from Pine Cay and NNP Cay , two small islands in DT Turks and Caicos archipelago to DT north of DT Caribbean , where PRP had been studying DT lives and times of its resident anole lizards ( Anolis scriptus ) . On 8 September last NN , Hurricane Irma struck DT islands , battering them with sustained winds of up to 265 kilometres per hour . Irma was DT first category - 5 hurricane on record to strike DT region , but more was to come : two weeks later , Hurricane Maria swept across DT islands with winds of up to 200 kilometres per hour . Dozens of NNS in DT region died . Reconstruction and rebuilding efforts continue . Read DT paper : Hurricane - induced selection on DT morphology of an island lizard Three weeks after DT winds had died down , DT researchers were back on Pine Cay and NNP Cay to assess DT damage , and to see how ( or even if ) their lizards had survived . Their NN , published this week in Nature , is DT first to use an immediate before - and - after comparison to assess DT impacts of hurricanes on evolutionary selection ( C. M. Donihue et al . Nature http://doi.org/csgp; 2018 ) . Serendipity can VB only so far . DT researchers had n’t marked DT lizards , so PRP MD n’t identify and track DT fate of individuals . But PRP found clear trends of natural selection in action . In general , anoles found after DT storms had bigger toepads , longer forelimbs and shorter hindlimbs than did lizards collected before DT storm . What have these traits to do with hurricanes ? DT lizards live in bushes and other low - growing vegetation . Toepads allow them purchase on DT branches as PRP move , and PRP ’s a fair bet IN limb proportions RB play a part in helping a lizard to keep in contact with a branch , resisting moves by predators , other lizards — or , as PRP turned out , hurricanes — to knock them off . DT researchers took their idea further with a simple laboratory experiment , in which PRP allowed lizards to VB settled on a perch and then blew them off using a commercial leaf blower , recording DT speed at which DT lizards were dislodged . ( DT lizards flew into comfy padding , and were not injured in DT experiments . ) This experiment supported DT researchers ’ hypothesis . In particular , PRP showed IN when lizards are subjected to a stiff breeze , PRP hang on tightly with their forelimbs and let their hindlimbs hang loose . Longer hindlimbs , then , offer more purchase to DT winds , explaining why lizards found after DT storms tended to have shorter hindlimbs , but longer forelimbs . These bigger toepads , shorter hindlimbs and longer forelimbs did not evolve as a direct response to DT hurricanes , but PRP show how such evolution occurs . Natural selection interfered with DT way in which these traits were spread across DT population . Specifically , those lizards unable to hang on when DT storms blew up — those with smaller toepads , longer hindlimbs and shorter forelimbs — were ( presumably ) blown away and perished . Those lizards better able to hang on tightly MD have survived to weather another day . In technical terms , DT mean values of DT crucial traits measured before DT storms had shifted . These changes are phenotypic — merely observable characteristics . PRP say nothing about DT genetic assimilation of such changes , which will presumably happen when DT surviving lizards breed and JJ lizards are recruited to DT population . Such changes are unlikely to be DT last , given DT expected increases in extreme weather WDT DT future will bring .

text: DT start of DT northern meteorological winter on December 1 will bring with PRP short days of darkness , blistering cold and frigid blizzards . For JJ NNS , this is DT dreariest NN of DT NN . But for a small niche of NN - happy athletes , winter is a NN to play , as ferocious storms send rippling rings of NN outward through DT ocean . By DT NN PRP reach distant shores , these swells have matured into clean , polished waves WDT barrel in with a cold and ceaseless military rhythm ; PRP touch bottom , slow , build and , finally , collapse in spectacular curls and thundering white NN . These are DT things of dreams for surfers , JJ of whom travel DT NN , pursuing giant breakers . And surfers are n’t DT only ones with their eyes on DT NN — for surfing has become a popular spectator sport . At JJ famed breaks , bluffs on DT shore provide fans with thrilling views of DT action . DT waves alone are awesome — so powerful PRP MD seem to shake DT NN . But when a tiny human figure on a board as flimsy as a matchstick appears on DT face of DT incoming giant , zigzagging forward as DT wave curls overhead and threatens to crush him , spines tingle , hands come together in prayer , and jaws drop . Whether PRP VBP DT NN or not , big - wave surfing is CD of DT most thrilling shows on DT NN . DT birth of big - wave surfing was an incremental process WDT began in DT 1930s and ’ 40s in Hawaii , especially along DT north - facing shores of DT islands . Here , 15 - foot waves were once considered giants , and anything much bigger just eye candy . But wave at a NN , surfers stoked up their courage and ambition . PRP surfed on bigger days , used lighter and lighter boards WDT allowed swifter paddling and hunted for breaks WDT consistently produced monsters . CD by CD , big - wave spots were cataloged , named and ranked , and wave at a NN , records were set . In November 1957 , big - wave pioneer Greg Noll rode an estimated 25 - footer in Waimea Bay , Oahu . In 1969 , Noll surfed what was probably a 30 - plus - footer , but no verified photos exist of DT wave , and thus no means of determining its height . Fast - forwarding a few decades , Mike Parsons caught a 66 - foot breaker in 2001 at Cortes Bank , 115 miles off San Diego , where a seamount rises to within three feet of DT surface . In 2008 , Parsons was back at DT same place and caught a 77 - footer . But Garrett McNamara outdid Parsons and set DT current record in November 2011 , when he rode a 78 - foot wave off DT coast of Portugal , at DT town of Nazare . But these later records MD not have been possible without DT assistance of jet skis , which have become a common and controversial element in DT pursuit of giant waves . DT vehicles first began appearing in DT surf during big - wave events in DT early 1990s , and for all their noise and stench , their appeal was undeniable : Jet skis made PRP possible to access waves 40 feet and bigger , and whose scale had previously been too grand for most unassisted surfers to reach by paddling . text: What is a man IN Joe doing with Bigfoot ? Joe is a mexicano who knew some of DT same Spanish folktales WDT Juan B. Rael had collected JJ NNS earlier in DT area around Antonito , Colorado . Joe is a lot IN his father , Anastacio , whose boot ‐making shop had RB become a little community center . Joe remembers sheepherders complaining to his father IN DT police had stolen their money . DT sheepherders came to town to collect their pay and VB on a bender . PRP deposited most of their money with DT cops who pocketed PRP for themselves and denied having received PRP . Anastacio was n't afraid of confronting DT cops . Joe 's dad was a valorista , or brave man of his word who defended DT weak against DT strong . Joe told me DT folktales he had learned from his parents and then nudged me in a different direction . He took me to his backyard shed , pulled out a dusty box of manuscripts he had written in long hand and asked me to read them . Joe liked to read western novels by Louis L'amour and emulated DT author 's style . CD of DT manuscripts was a story about Bigfoot . I knew about his interest in DT creature because he had shown PRP a video he and his son had taken of large footprints with an unusually long gait in DT snow south of town . Looked IN a bear or something big . ” Marc follows leads to an old mexicano sheepherder who lives in Velarde , NNP Mexico , who ran into DT creature on DT llano near Ute Mountain . DT sheepherder has a daughter , Cristina , and she becomes Marc 's lover and companion , and together PRP enter Bigfoot 's NN in DT volcanic caverns under DT llano . Marc and Cristina discover DT creature 's NN is IN DT of humans above DT llano . DT strong prey on DT weak in both places . text: A carbon tax is paid by businesses and industries WDT produce carbon dioxide through their operations . DT tax is designed to reduce DT output of greenhouse gases and carbon dioxide , a colorless and odorless incombustible gas , into DT atmosphere . DT tax is imposed with DT goal of environmental protection . A tax designed to mitigate or remove DT negative externalities of carbon emission , a carbon tax is a type of Pigovian tax . Carbon is found in every kind of hydrocarbon fuel ( including coal , petroleum , and natural gas ) and is released as DT harmful toxin carbon dioxide ( CO ) when this kind of fuel is burned . CO is DT compound primarily responsible for DT " greenhouse " effect of trapping heat within DT NNP 's atmosphere , and is , therefore , CD of DT primary causes of JJ NN . A carbon tax is RB referred to as a form of carbon pricing on greenhouse gas NNS where a fixed price is set by DT NN for carbon NNS in certain sectors . DT price is passed through from businesses to consumers . By increasing DT cost of greenhouse NNS , governments hope to curb consumption , reduce DT demand for fossil fuels , and push more companies toward creating environmentally - friendly substitutes . A carbon tax is a way for a NN to exert some control over carbon NNS without resorting to DT levers of a command economy , by which DT NN MD control DT means of production and manually halt carbon NNS . Any carbon found in manufactured products IN plastics WDT is not burned is not taxed . DT same applies to any CO WDT is permanently isolated from production and is not released into DT atmosphere . But DT tax is paid during DT upstream process , or when DT fuel or gas is extracted from DT NNP . Producers can then pass on DT tax to DT market by as much as PRP can . This , in turn , gives consumers a chance to reduce their own carbon footprints . Carbon taxes have been implemented in a number of NNS around DT NN . PRP take several different forms , but most amount to a straightforward rate of taxation per ton of hydrocarbon fuel used . DT first country to implement a carbon tax was Finland , in 1990 . DT levy currently stands at $ 24.39 dollars per ton of carbon . DT Finns were quickly followed by other Nordic NNS — Sweden and Norway both implemented their own carbon taxes in 1991 . Starting at a rate of $ 51 per ton of CO used in gasoline ( DT tax MD later decrease considerably ) , DT Norwegian tax is among DT most stringent in DT NN . Most forms of carbon taxation have been deployed successfully , but Australia 's failed attempt from 2012 - 2014 stands in stark contrast . DT minority Green party was able to broker DT carbon tax during a period of political stagnation in 2011 , but DT tax never garnered DT support of either of DT main parties in Australia , DT left - leaning Labor Party ( which reluctantly agreed to DT tax to form a NN with DT Greens ) and DT center - right Liberals , whose leader Tony Abbott spearheaded DT 2014 repeal . IN most JJ initiatives to combat NN NN , carbon taxes remain highly controversial .

Tonsils are lumps of tissue on both sides of DT back of DT throat WDT help DT immune system protect DT body from infections . text: Can DT Weather Affect My Child 's Asthma ? Yes . Weather conditions can bring on asthma symptoms . Some kids ' asthma symptoms VBP worse at certain times of DT NN . In some places , heat and sunlight combine with pollutants to create ground - level ozone . This kind of ozone can be a strong asthma trigger . Wet weather and windy weather can cause problems too . Wet weather encourages mold growth , and wind can blow mold and pollen through DT air . text: NN wo n't be DT last outbreak . NN NN , waning habitat will drive NN Researchers are n't clear yet about how DT novel NN began infecting NNS , but say PRP seems to have originated in bats , making PRP DT latest in a string of emerging human NN WDT spread from animals . NN and wildlife experts say PRP expect to see a rise in diseases transmitted among animals , plants and humans , and in particular , more frequent outbreaks in humans of diseases WDT come from animals . Such " zoonotic " diseases already make up DT majority of JJ infections in humans . But animals are n't to blame for DT increase in JJ outbreaks , according to Arizona NNP University virologist Arvind Varsani . Humans are . Varsani researches DT emergence of diseases around DT globe and he VBD two major factors likely to impact DT dynamics of NN spread are NN NN and changes in land use due to urbanization or agriculture . Both factors put animals under strain , forcing them to compete for resources in shrinking habitats and making them opportune hosts for zoonotic diseases , which more easily infect stressed animals . Shrinking suitable habitat amid urbanization and DT rapid expansion of agriculture RB cluster animals closer together with humans and domestic animals . DT allows DT viruses to jump from CD host to DT next . “ PRP stress these animals and DT means PRP ’re creating an environment for viruses to succeed , where in most NNS DT viruses MD ’ve been put to check , " he VBD . " And with DT , everyone is in very , very close proximity to each other , so what PRP ’ve got is CD event — and PRP only need CD event to take off — and DT next thing PRP VBP , PRP 's spilling over . ” And sometimes , DT viruses spill over into humans . According to a 2016 report from DT NNP Nations Environment Programme , around 60 percent of all infectious diseases in humans are zoonotic , as well as 75 percent of all emerging infectious diseases . Researchers RB detected an increase in DT rate of JJ , emerging infectious diseases , according to DT report . In DT case of DT novel NN , DT source is believed to be a market in Wuhan , NNP , WDT sold both dead and live animals . Arizona Game and Fish wildlife veterinarian Anne Justice - Allen VBD IN veterinarians and NN experts strongly recommend against having markets IN these , which can be densely packed , difficult to keep clean , and pose a higher risk of viruses jumping from animals into humans . She VBD DT current NN - CD outbreak is an example of how human actions to mix together animals WDT were n't normally together can cause diseases to jump into JJ hosts . " DT more PRP increase DT interaction between NNS and animals , especially wildlife and especially livestock as well , or animals WDT are raised for food , DT more likely PRP are to see DT kind of situation crop up , " she VBD . DT NNP - CD outbreak is an example of DT risk zoonotic diseases pose . Other well - known examples of zoonotic diseases WDT impact humans are West Nile NN , HIV , Ebola , Zika , bird NN , Middle East respiratory syndrome , or MERS , Rift Valley fever , and sudden acute respiratory syndrome , or SARS . On average , CD JJ infectious NN emerges in humans every four months , according to DT UNEP report , but not all are this severe . “ While PRP is very uncommon for diseases in animals to suddenly jump and become so transmissible between NNS as this NN did , DT more PRP do DT sort of thing , mixing animals together ... then DT more likely IN NN is VBG to be able to jump into NNS and become transmissible between NNS , " Justice - Allen VBD . With NN NN effects such as drought , increasing temperatures and wildfires , Justice - Allen VBD animals will be forced to move to JJ areas . DT MD lead to DT same type of crowding and mixing seen in live animal markets and possibly expose animals to JJ diseases . FIGHTING NN : Using robots to speed up testing , ASU hopes to open drive - thru NN testing VBG JJ temperatures are increasing DT habitat ranges of some insects WDT transmit diseases from CD organism to another , such as mosquitoes or ticks . NN is RB lengthening DT season in which these insects can survive in some areas , leading to a boom in their population . In certain areas , these insects , RB known as NN vectors , are now able to survive NN - round where PRP were n't able to before . DT increased range and abundance of vectors MD lead to more widespread NNS of mosquito - and tick - borne diseases such as malaria , West Nile NN , dengue fever , chikungunya , Zika , and Lyme NN , according to Heidi Brown , an ASU researcher who studies vector - borne diseases . Brown is CD of DT researchers who works with DT Arizona Department of NNP Services on a Building Resilience Against NNP Effects plan , which investigates DT impacts of NN NN on human NN , projects future scenarios and suggests solutions to mitigate those effects . Arizona is CD of 16 NN grant recipients creating a BRACE plan as part of DT CDC's NNP - Ready NNPS and Cities Initiative . " PRP have to be prepared for DT known , which is increases in DT stuff WDT PRP 're already seeing , but PRP RB have to be prepared for DT unknown , which is novel introductions , " she VBD . In Arizona , known diseases such as West Nile NNP are likely to become a bigger concern , and MD spread into JJ areas of DT NN outside of Maricopa County , Brown VBD . " Flagstaff does n't typically VB about or worry too much about West Nile NNP , and PRP do n't usually have a lot of NNS up RB , but EX 's evidence WDT suggests IN PRP might need to start making sure IN PRP 're watching for PRP , " she VBD . Arizona is RB worried about other mosquito - born diseases IN chikungunya and dengue fever , which are n't currently part of Arizona 's ecosystem but MD become permanently established in DT future . Factors IN drought can RB cause vectors to cluster around NN sources alongside of animals , leading to further mixing and further possibilities for JJ diseases spread in vectors . Another bridge between humans and animal diseases is domestic animals , according to Bernard Bett , a scientist at International Livestock Research Institute . Around DT NN , Bett VBD agriculture is increasingly encroaching on wild lands , bringing humans and domestic animals closer to wild ones and disturbing DT natural ecosystem . But domestic animals have been bred in such a way IN PRP lack DT genetic diversity needed for NN resilience and can then pass DT infection on to humans . CD example is DT bird NN , which moved from wild birds into domestic poultry before being passed to humans . Demand for milk and meat " driven mainly by fast - growing populations of urban consumers in developing NNS , " is projected to double by 2050 , according to DT UNEP report , meaning IN DT problem is likely to VB worse as agricultural demand expands . Urbanization RB can encroach on wild lands , Varsani VBD , and DT means humans are coming into increased contact with animals — creating another potential avenue for NN transmission . Increased zoonotic NN spread MD RB have devastating effects on animals , especially those already at risk from other NN NN effects . “ PRP have a number of endangered species here in Arizona which are kind of on DT edge when PRP comes to being able to respond to JJ stressors , " Justice - Allen VBD . CD is DT Mount Graham red squirrel , whose habitat was severely damaged by a wildfire in 2017 . While DT population seems to be recovering , Justice - Allen VBD , " another stressor might tip them over DT edge . " Other populations on DT brink include DT California condor , DT black - footed ferret , and Arizona 's indigenous snakes and amphibians such as frogs . Some are already being challenged by NN . Black - footed ferrets feed on prairie dogs , but DT plague , spread by fleas , can wipe out entire colonies of prairie dogs , decimating DT ferrets ' food supply . This NN is n't native to North America , currently has a small incident rate in humans and is curable in most NNS . But NNS of plague MD surge in coming NNS due to NN NN , according to Justice - Allen . " DT dynamics of plague outbreaks is changing , or will VB , " she VBD . " This spring is setting PRP up for a pretty significant plague outbreak . " Arizona 's frogs and other amphibians are battling a fungal NN called chytridiomycosis , which was first seen in Africa and interferes with DT ability of their skin to absorb moisture . These diseases , along with mosquito - and tick - borne diseases , are just a few known diseases WDT Arizona experts are monitoring . But EX 's always DT possibility for unknowns — for JJ diseases to show up unexpectedly — especially in tight living conditions . In more clustered spaces , Varsani VBD EX 's a greater chance for an animal to become infected with two different diseases at DT same NN , opening DT possibility for DT birth of chimeras , or mash - ups , of two different , related viruses . If two viruses are infecting DT same cell , when those viruses replicate , PRP can combine into a JJ hybrid NN WDT MD jump into JJ animals WDT were previously unaffected . " PRP mix components and what PRP ’re then doing is PRP ’re allowing for these viral genomes to evolve very rapidly and adapt to a JJ host , " he VBD . Varsani RB works to find and VB unknown viruses in remote areas , such as DT polar regions . He has traveled to Antarctica nearly every NN since he first visited about seven NNS ago , and VBD viruses he studies RB MD have been around for a while , but were only discovered recently . CD example is a circovirus WDT has only recently been noticed in penguins and WDT causes lethal feather loss . Viruses in DT polar regions are just as abundant as PRP are in other parts of DT NN , he VBD , and since DT polar regions are expected to see some of DT most dramatic changes due to NN NN , these regions and their viruses are crucial to understand for DT future . As seen with DT NN - CD outbreak , NNS for JJ diseases take NN to develop , as do tests to screen for them . Arizona and other NNS have come up with plans to deal with increased outbreaks and have vector - control measures in place , but Brown acknowledged IN PRP can be hard to prepare for JJ emerging diseases . " PRP 's a long process to be able to come up with tests and identify JJ pathogens , especially when PRP 're not DT ones PRP 're used to looking for . ” DT Arizona Game and Fish Department monitors for JJ NN emergences by surveilling animal populations and investigating animal deaths to ensure IN DT cause of death was n't an unknown NN , according to Justice - Allen . Bett VBD NN care officials can take other measures to ensure IN EX is a structured , strong NN system in place with contingency plans for NN outbreaks and centers where patients can be isolated or receive supportive treatment . “ I wonder to what extent DT U.S. anticipated this spread . If PRP have good anticipation , DT ’s a good first line of defense , " Bett VBD . Even with further NN of NN effects on NN , EX can be unpredicted challenges in trying to anticipate and address JJ diseases , VBD Ben Beard , DT deputy director of DT CDC ’s Division of Vector - Borne Diseases in Fort Collins , Colorado . " While long term trends in NN NN can be modeled , specific weather events or disasters such as hurricanes , floods , or fires are very difficult to predict and MD have a big impact on NN outbreaks , " he wrote in an email to DT Republic . To prepare and respond to future outbreaks , he VBD , a strong JJ NN framework WDT prioritizes JJ NN surveillance , NN and local preparedness , and long - term research MD be necessary . In addition to being more conscious of how NNS affect DT environment and existing ecosystems , Varsani VBD identifying and understanding DT viruses present in DT NN currently can help society better prepare to control them . This is no small feat , considering IN viruses are among DT most abundant entities on DT NN . " Viruses are understudied , " he VBD . “ PRP have no idea what DT next entity will be , nobody expected this outbreak to take place and it's now consumed most of DT NN in a very short period . ” Amanda Morris covers all things bioscience , which includes NN care , technology , JJ research and DT environment . text: DT JJ average atmospheric carbon dioxide in 2018 was 407.4 parts per million ( ppm for short ) , with a range of uncertainty of plus or minus 0.1 ppm . Carbon dioxide levels today are higher than at any point in at least DT past 800,000 NNS . In fact , DT last NN DT atmospheric CO amounts were this high was more than 3 million NNS ago , when temperature was 2°–3 °C ( 3.6°–5.4 °F ) higher than during DT pre-industrial era , and NN level was 15 – 25 meters ( 50 – 80 feet ) higher than today . Carbon dioxide concentrations are rising mostly because of DT fossil fuels WDT NNS are burning for NN . Fossil fuels IN coal and oil contain carbon WDT plants pulled out of DT atmosphere through photosynthesis over DT span of JJ millions of NNS ; PRP are returning DT carbon to DT atmosphere in just a few hundred NNS . Squeeze or stretch DT graph in either direction by holding DT Shift key while PRP click and drag . DT bright red line ( source data ) shows monthly average carbon dioxide at NOAA 's Mauna Loa Observatory on Hawai'i in parts per million ( ppm ) : DT number of carbon dioxide molecules per million molecules of dry air . Over DT course of DT NN , values are higher in Northern Hemisphere winter and lower in summer . DT dark red line shows DT annual trend , calculated as a 12 - month rolling average . According to DT NN of DT NNP in 2018 report from NOAA and DT American Meteorological Society , JJ atmospheric carbon dioxide was 407.4 ± 0.1 ppm in 2018 , a JJ record high . DT is an increase of 2.5 ± 0.1 ppm from 2017 , similar to DT increase of 2.2 ± 0.1 ppm between 2016 and 2017 . In DT 1960s , DT JJ growth rate of atmospheric carbon dioxide was roughly 0.6 ± 0.1 ppm per NN . Over DT past decade , however , DT growth rate has been closer to 2.3 ppm per NN . DT annual rate of increase in atmospheric carbon dioxide over DT past 60 NNS is about 100 times faster than previous natural increases , such as those WDT occurred at DT end of DT last NN age 11,000 - 17,000 NNS ago . Carbon dioxide is a greenhouse gas : a gas WDT absorbs and radiates heat . Warmed by sunlight , NNP ’s land and ocean surfaces continuously radiate thermal infrared NN ( heat ) . Unlike oxygen or nitrogen ( which make up most of our atmosphere ) , greenhouse gases absorb DT heat and release PRP gradually over NN , IN bricks in a fireplace after DT fire goes out . Without this natural greenhouse effect , NNP ’s average annual temperature MD be below freezing instead of close to 60 °F . But increases in greenhouse gases have tipped DT NNP 's NN budget out of balance , trapping additional heat and raising NNP 's average temperature . Carbon dioxide is DT most important of NNP ’s long - lived greenhouse gases . PRP absorbs less heat per molecule than DT greenhouse gases methane or nitrous oxide , but PRP ’s more abundant and PRP stays in DT atmosphere much longer . And while carbon dioxide is less abundant and less powerful than NN vapor on a molecule per molecule basis , PRP absorbs wavelengths of thermal NN WDT NN vapor does not , which means PRP adds to DT greenhouse effect in a unique way . Increases in atmospheric carbon dioxide are responsible for about two - thirds of DT total NN imbalance WDT is causing NNP 's temperature to rise . Another reason carbon dioxide is important in DT NNP system is IN PRP dissolves into DT ocean IN DT fizz in a can of soda . PRP reacts with NN molecules , producing carbonic acid and lowering DT ocean 's pH . Since DT start of DT Industrial Revolution , DT pH of DT ocean 's surface waters has dropped from 8.21 to 8.10 . This drop in pH is called ocean acidification . A drop of 0.1 MD not seem IN a lot , but DT pH scale is logarithmic ; a 1 - unit drop in pH means a tenfold increase in acidity . A NN of 0.1 means a roughly 30 % increase in acidity . Increasing acidity interferes with DT ability of marine life to extract calcium from DT NN to build their shells and skeletons . Natural increases in carbon dioxide concentrations have periodically warmed NNP ’s temperature during NN age cycles over DT past million NNS or more . DT warm episodes ( interglacials ) began with a small increase in sunlight due to a tiny wobble in NNP ’s axis of rotation or in DT path of its orbit around DT Sun . DT little bit of extra sunlight caused a little bit of NN . As DT oceans warmed , PRP outgassed carbon dioxide — IN a can of soda VBG flat in DT heat of a summer day . DT extra carbon dioxide in DT atmosphere amplified DT initial NN . Based on air bubbles trapped in mile - thick NN cores ( and other paleoclimate evidence ) , PRP VBP IN during DT NN age cycles of DT past million NNS or so , carbon dioxide never exceeded 300 ppm . Before DT Industrial Revolution started in DT mid-1700s , DT JJ average amount of carbon dioxide was about 280 ppm . By DT NN continuous observations began at Mauna Loa Volcanic Observatory in 1958 , JJ atmospheric carbon dioxide was already 315 ppm . On NNP 9 , 2013 , DT daily average carbon dioxide measured at Mauna Loa surpassed 400 ppm for DT first NN on record . Less than two NNS later , in 2015 , DT JJ amount went over 400 ppm for DT first NN . If JJ NN demand continues to grow and to be met mostly with fossil fuels , atmospheric carbon dioxide is projected to exceed 900 ppm by DT end of this century . Collins , M. , R. Knutti , J. text: Melbourne , 25 June 2012 : Australian infectious NN therapy and NN development company BioDiem Ltd ( ASX : BDM ) announced today DT signing of a licensing agreement with Australian National University ( ANU ) . This agreement is for an exclusive JJ license to commercialise a novel NN technology from DT John Curtin School of NNP Research at ANU . Dengue Fever is DT lead indication , but DT technology MD RB facilitate DT design of NNS against a number of other infectious diseases including Murray River encephalitis and Japanese encephalitis . DT increasing incidence of mosquito - borne NN is a major NN concern worldwide as NN NN expands DT range of DT carrier mosquitoes , exposing larger human populations . DT agreement includes provision for BioDiem to sublicense DT technology . Industry standard royalties apply , but apart from a small contribution towards patent registration costs EX is no up - front outlay for BioDiem . DT agreement follows DT signing of a term sheet announced to DT ASX on 6 June 2012 . Dengue Fever is a NN caused by a mosquito - borne NN WDT affects between 50 and 100 million NNS a NN , and according to DT NNP NNP Organization DT incidence is increasing significantly . Although only a small percentage of NNS are fatal , non-fatal NNS can be extremely debilitating . Dengue Fever currently has no existing NN , and control methods currently include attempts to address mosquito populations with varying effectiveness . DT technology is complementary to DT BioDiem portfolio as well as DT company 's strategic focus on NNS and therapies for infectious diseases and related cancers . " PRP are delighted to announce DT completion of this licensing agreement , which sees BioDiem 's commercial expertise in DT area of NNS fittingly partnered with DT exciting research developed by ANU . Our focus on infectious diseases is an excellent fit for this JJ technology which has strong potential as an asset for outlicensing " VBD BioDiem CEO Julie Phillips . BioDiem 's current strategy for DT ANU technology includes leveraging DT company 's JJ partnering network to deliver an outlicensing partner for development of DT technology , providing an opportunity to secure a royalties stream without significant development costs on DT part of BioDiem . BioDiem is an ASX - listed company based in Melbourne with an international focus on discovering , developing and commercialising NN - class research and technology targeting cancers and infectious diseases . BioDiem 's core technologies include DT Live Attenuated Influenza NNP ( LAIV ) , DT SAVINE platform and DT BDM - I antimicrobial compound . DT LAIV influenza NN is an intranasal NN to prevent infection from seasonal and pandemic influenza . DT LAIV influenza NN can be produced using both egg - based and cell - based manufacturing methods . DT cell - based LAIV NN has completed a Phase II clinical trial in Europe . DT egg - based LAIV NN technology is licensed to DT NNP NNP Organization as part of DT NNP Pandemic Influenza Action Plan to Increase NNP Supply . DT LAIV influenza NN is marketed as Nasovac™ in India by DT Serum Institute of India , and has been licensed to NNP - based Changchun BCHT Biotechnology Co . DT LAIV NN was in - licensed from DT Institute of Experimental Medicine in St Petersburg , Russia where PRP has been used for over a decade in JJ millions of NNS - NNS , adults and DT elderly . DT LAIV is administered by nasal spray and induces a rapid immune response in DT mucosal lining of DT nose and pharynx . DT LAIV is RB being developed as a viral vector for making novel non-influenza NNS for different diseases including cancers . Viruses have DT ability to generate proteins prolifically and can be programmed to produce NN - specific proteins . As part of a NN , NN - specific proteins can help generate a beneficial immune response . John Quincy Adams was DT eldest son of NNP John Adams and DT sixth NN of DT NNP NNPS . In his pre-presidential NNS , Adams was CD of America 's greatest diplomats ( formulating , among other things , what became DT Monroe Doctrine ) ; in his post - presidential NNS , he conducted a consistent and often dramatic fight against DT expansion of slavery . Though full of promise , his presidential NNS were difficult . He died in 1848 in Washington , D.C . Born on July 11 , 1767 , in Braintree , Massachusetts , John Quincy was DT son of John Adams , a prodigy of DT American Revolution who MD become DT second U.S. NN just before his John Quincy 's 30th birthday , and his wife , future first lady Abigail Adams . As a child , Adams witnessed firsthand DT birth of DT nation . From DT family farm , he and his mother watched DT Battle of Bunker Hill in 1775 . During his NN in DT Senate , he supported DT Louisiana Purchase and NNP Thomas Jefferson 's Embargo Act—actions WDT made him very unpopular with other Federalists . In June 1808 , Adams broke with DT Federalists , resigned from his Senate seat and became a Democratic - Republican . Adams returned to DT diplomatic corps in 1809 , when NNP James Madison appointed him DT first officially recognized minister to Russia ( Francis Dana was never officially accepted as a U.S. ambassador by DT Russian NN ) . DT following NN , Adams served as minister to England , a position his father had held 30 NNS earlier . In a post he was most suited for , Adams served as secretary of NN in NNP James Monroe 's administration from 1817 to 1825 . During this NN , he negotiated DT Adams - Onis Treaty , acquiring Florida for DT NNP NNPS . By 1824 , Adams was well - positioned to be DT next NN of DT NNP NNPS . Running against Adams were Southerners John C. Calhoun and William Crawford , and Westerners Henry Clay and Andrew Jackson . In DT Electoral College vote , no CD candidate had a clear majority and , subsequently , DT election was sent to DT House of Representatives . Clay threw his support to Adams , who was elected on DT first ballot . Adams 's victory shocked Jackson , who had won DT popular vote and fully expected to be NN . When Adams later appointed Clay secretary of NN , Jackson Democrats cried " corrupt bargain , " and were enraged at DT seemingly quid pro quo arrangement . Adams entered DT presidency with several debilitating political liabilities . He possessed DT temperament of his father : Aloof , stubborn and ferociously independent in his convictions . As NN , Adams failed to develop DT political relationships needed — even among members of his own party — to effect significant NN . PRP did n't help IN his political opponents were set on making him a CD - term NN . text: VB breaking NN alerts and special reports . DT NN and stories WDT matter , delivered weekday mornings . More than 100 bushfires are raging in Australia as DT continent swelters under record heat , a double whammy of extremes WDT has amplified scrutiny of what experts say is stark inaction from DT NN on NN NN . DT summit ended Sunday in a stalemate , with NNS largely delaying major decisions on plans to cut carbon NNS until next NN 's conference . " PRP was terribly disappointing , " Merzian VBD . text: NN NN - what are PRP doing ? DT council adopted a NNP NNP Strategy in April 2014 , which was refreshed in 2017 to bring PRP up to speed with other local and national developments in DT NN NN agenda . PRP included DT adoption of national targets around carbon emission reductions and DT use of renewable NN .
