PRP are now developing a draft NNP NNP and Air Quality Strategy WDT PRP plan to publish for consultation later in 2020 . This will outline DT steps WDT PRP ’ll be taking to tackle DT issue and reduce our impact on DT environment . DT drive to become a carbon neutral borough by 2030 starts now and PRP have started work to set out DT steps PRP as a council can take and how PRP can work together as a borough . In December 2019 , PRP held a NN NN summit to bring together ideas with partners . View a copy of DT presentation and DT Outcomes Report . Already PRP have : • Installed solar panels on DT roof of several of our council buildings . • Improved DT NN performance of DT council ’s Deanes and Parklands buildings • Set up a group of Environment Champions to promote sustainable practices among staff . • Installed a fresh air cooling system at DT Civic Offices , as well as being environmentally - friendly , DT initiative will generate a saving of £ 9,500 per NN . • Reduced DT distances our bin trucks travel by rebalancing DT rounds , with a monthly carbon saving of 3.8 % per month . With partners , PRP have : • Adopted a transport strategy with a focus on encouraging more sustainable transport including cycling and walking . • Given out loans and grants to improve insulation and install renewable NN sources . • Supported residents to apply for NN funding for NN efficient boilers . PRP are working on our next steps looking at greener ways of delivering council services . Here are just a few of DT projects PRP are working on : • With advice from DT NNP Savings Trust PRP are exploring greater use of electric vehicles . • Updating our Local Plan to ensure tougher standards associated with NN NN and NNS . • Reviewing DT NN efficiency of our accommodation and our staff and councillors ’ travel . • Delivering 3,500 homes at Manydown using DT Garden Towns ’ principle .

When asked if he still believed DT UN was trying to impose a worldwide NN through NN NN policy , Mr Roberts answered : “ Definitely ” . In 2011 , Mr Roberts wrote a letter to then Australian Prime Minister Julia Gillard demanding to be exempted from DT country ’s carbon tax . text: NNS often confuse DT concepts of JJ NN and NN NN , and PRP does n’t help IN NN companies often substitute CD for DT other in TV , newspaper , and social NN reporting . This is somewhat understandable since DT two concepts overlap a great deal . In fact , EX is a causal relationship between DT two . However , EX are some subtle and some not - so - subtle differences between JJ NN and NN NN . DT phrase JJ NN is used by NNS to mean a long - term increase in NNP ’s average air temperature . PRP can refer specifically to such NN WDT is due to DT influence of rising concentrations of greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere . NNP ’s surface gets most of its heat from DT NN associated with DT Sun ’s rays , which strike DT NN ’s surface during DT day . At night most of this NN is radiated back into space . Greenhouse gases ( such as carbon dioxide , methane , nitrous oxides , and chlorofluorocarbons [ CFCs ] ) absorb infrared radiation ( net heat NN ) emitted from NNP ’s surface and radiate PRP back to DT surface , thus contributing to DT greenhouse effect . Though DT recent rise in greenhouse gases in DT atmosphere is arguably DT main factor affecting JJ NN , other factors are involved ( such as variations in NNP ’s orbit , DT angle of DT NN ’s axis , and variations in DT Sun ’s NN output ) . Nevertheless , as higher concentrations of greenhouse gases allow NNP ’s atmosphere to hold on to greater amounts of heat WDT MD normally escape into space at night , NNP ’s average temperature rises . NN NN is a bit different . Before PRP look into what NN NN is , PRP MD be helpful to VB a bit about NN with respect to weather . Weather , which is often confused with NN , is DT set of conditions in DT atmosphere in CD location for a limited period of NN , such as throughout DT day , at night , or at any particular point during DT day . NN , on DT other hand , is DT average condition of DT atmosphere in a given location over a long period of NN , such as 30 NNS or more . Thus , NN NN is a longer - term NN in DT average condition of DT atmosphere . Human beings most certainly contribute to NN NN by adding greenhouse gases to DT atmosphere , but this is only part of DT equation . Over hundreds of thousands to millions of NNS , DT continents collide with other continents or break apart , changing DT paths of ocean currents and local winds . text: How To Discuss “ NN NN ” With A ‘ Woke ’ Teenager After our daughter of fifteen NNS of age was moved to tears by DT speech of Greta Thunberg at DT UN DT other day , she became angry with our generation “ who had been doing nothing for thirty NNS . ” So , PRP decided to help her prevent what DT girl on TV announced of “ massive eradication and DT disappearance of entire ecosystems . ” PRP are now committed to give our daughter a future again , by doing our part to help cool DT NN four degrees . From now on she will VB to school on a bicycle , because driving her by car costs fuel , and fuel puts NNS into DT atmosphere . Of course PRP will be winter soon and then she will VB to VB by bus , but cycling through DT freezing builds resilience . Of course , she is now asking for an electric bicycle , but PRP have shown her DT devastation caused to DT areas of DT NN as a result of mining for DT extraction of Lithium and other minerals used to make batteries for electric bicycles , so she will be pedaling , or walking . Which will not harm her , or DT NN . PRP used to cycle and walk to school too . Since DT girl on TV demanded “ PRP need to VB rid of our dependency on fossil fuels ” and our daughter agreed with her , PRP have disconnected DT heat vent in her room . DT temperature is now dropping to twelve degrees in DT evening , and will drop below freezing in DT winter , PRP have promised to buy her an extra sweater , hat , tights , gloves and a blanket . For DT same reason PRP have decided IN from now on she only takes a cold shower . She will wash her clothes by hand , with a wooden washboard , because DT washing machine is simply a power consumer and since DT dryer uses natural gas , she will hang her clothes on DT clothes line to dry , just IN my parents and grandparents used to do . Speaking of clothes , DT ones WDT she currently has are all synthetic , so made from petroleum . Therefore on Monday , PRP will bring all her designer clothing to DT secondhand shop . PRP have found an eco store where DT only clothing PRP sell is made from undyed and unbleached linen and jute . RB ca n’t have clothes made on wool , because DT NNS from farting sheep are supposedly causing bad weather . PRP should n’t matter IN PRP looks good on her , or IN she is VBG to be laughed at , dressing in colorless , bland clothes and without a wireless bra , but DT is DT price she has to pay for DT benefit of DT NNP . Cotton is out of DT question , as PRP comes from distant lands and pesticides are used for PRP . Very bad for DT environment . PRP just saw on her Instagram IN she ’s pretty angry with PRP . This was not our intention . From now on , at 7 p.m. PRP will turn off DT WiFi and PRP will only switch PRP on again DT next day after dinner for two hours . In this way PRP will save on electricity , so she is not bothered by electro - stress and will be totally isolated from DT outside NN . This way , she can concentrate solely on her homework . At eleven o’clock in DT evening PRP will pull DT breaker to shut DT power off to her room , so she knows IN dark is really dark . DT will save a lot of CO2 . She will no longer be participating in winter sports to ski lodges and resorts , nor will she be VBG on anymore vacations with PRP , because our vacation destinations are practically inaccessible by bicycle . Since our daughter fully agrees with DT girl on TV IN DT CO2 NNS and footprints of her great - grandparents are to blame for ‘ killing our NN ’ , what all this simply means , is IN she RB has to live IN her great - grandparents and PRP never had a holiday , a car or even a bicycle . PRP have n’t talked about DT carbon footprint of food yet . Zero CO2 footprint means no meat , no fish and no poultry , but RB no meat substitutes WDT are based on soy ( after all , WDT grows in farmers fields , WDT use machinery to harvest DT beans , trucks to transport to DT processing plants , where more NN is used , then trucked to DT packaging / canning plants , and trucked once again to DT stores ) and RB no imported food , because DT has a negative ecological effect . And absolutely no chocolate from Africa , no coffee from South America and no tea from Asia . Only homegrown potatoes , vegetables and fruit WDT have been grown in local cold soil , because greenhouses run on boilers , piped in CO2 and artificial light . Apparently , these things are RB bad for DT NNP . PRP will teach her how to grow her own food . Bread is still possible , but butter , milk , cheese and yogurt , cottage cheese and cream come from cows and PRP emit CO2 . No more margarine and no oils will be used for DT frying pan , because DT fat is palm oil from plantations in Borneo where rain forests first grew . No NN cream in DT summer . No soft drinks and no NN drinks , as DT bubbles are CO2 . PRP will RB ban all plastic , because PRP comes from chemical factories . Everything made of steel and aluminum must RB be removed . Have PRP ever seen DT amount of NN a blast furnace consumes or an aluminum smelter ? All bad for DT NN ! PRP will replace her memory foam pillow top mattress , with a jute bag filled with straw , with a horse hair pillow . And finally , she will no longer be using makeup , soap , shampoo , cream , lotion , conditioner , toothpaste and medication . Facewashers will all be linen , IN she can wash by hand , with her wooden washboard , just IN her female ancestors did before NN NN made her angry at PRP for destroying her future . In this way PRP will help her to do her part to prevent mass extinction , NN levels rising and DT disappearance of entire ecosystems . If she truly believes she wants to walk DT talk of DT girl on TV , she will gladly accept and happily embrace her JJ way of life . This article was posted : Wednesday , December 4 , 2019 at 5:24 am

text: BIR SALAH , TUNISIA - Samira Sghaier and a group of friends prune moringa trees under a searing sun , dropping fistfuls of leafy branches into plastic tubs . Prickly acacias edge DT plot of land , protecting bone - dry soil from further erosion . Sghaier ’s father once grew olive and fruit trees — varieties WDT mostly shriveled and died under her watch . “ EX has n’t been enough rain in recent NNS , ” says DT 52 - NN - old farmer . Her tiny farm in eastern Tunisia is a bellwether for DT dramatic environmental changes already reshaping North Africa , which threaten to intensify with NN NN . Sandwiched between an encroaching Sahara and a VBG Mediterranean NNP , DT region has seen a sharp drop in rainfall over DT past half century — a trend experts say will likely intensify in DT coming decades . Indeed , over DT course of this century parts of North Africa as well as DT Middle East might become uninhabitable , according to DT German research and policy organization , DT Max Planck Institute . “ PRP ’re seeing higher temperatures and increasing NN stress , ” says Essia Guezzi , NN and NN project officer for conservation group WWF North Africa , summing up some of DT regional challenges . Meanwhile , rising NN levels threaten DT region ’s largely coastal populations , she and others note . These and other issues will come into sharp focus during next month ’s NN summit in Spain , a fellow member of DT Mediterranean region WDT is considered a NN hotspot — more vulnerable to DT effects of NN NN than other parts of DT NN . While Morocco has earned praise as a NN - NN leader , DT North African region overall needs to do much more to counter an otherwise grim future , experts say . RB hampering efforts : some NNS are buffeted by conflict and civil unrest , while fossil fuels continue to drive Algerian and Libyan economies . Trying to turn DT tide In Tunisia , fresh groundwater reserves are shrinking rapidly . Roughly two - thirds of DT land is threatened by desertification . DT effects of NN NN are likely to slow DT country ’s growth , hitting two major revenue drivers — tourism and agriculture — according to a 2018 report by DT Netherlands Foreign Ministry . While Tunisian authorities have outlined ambitious targets — including cutting NNS 41 percent by 2030 compared to 2010 levels — PRP have been slow to match words with action , critics say . Nor did DT issue figure high on candidates ’ priorities in recent legislative and presidential elections . “ PRP seems IN DT environment and DT impact of NN NN is DT last concern of JJ Tunisian politicians , ” says Hamadi Gharbi , WWF North Africa NNP and NNP project manager , who says DT country RB needs more NN financing and expertise . In DT village of Bir Salah , Sghaier is trying , at least locally , to turn DT tide . She and other area farmers began planting hardy acacia trees to help reduce erosion , along with moringa , a fast - growing plant prized for its nutritional and medicinal properties . DT idea was to help fight NN NN and earn a profit doing so . DT reality has not been so easy . “ Everyone likes JJ products , ” Sghaier says , showing a visitor her storeroom packed with moringa oils and powders , along with bags of moringa - based bsissa , a Tunisian breakfast drink , which a group of growers have made and packaged . “ DT problem is selling them , ” she says . “ PRP ’s hard to find a market . ” Across DT Sahara , DT African Union has spearheaded an ambitious ‘ Great Green Wall ’ initiative aimed to restore degraded land across a swathe of DT Sahel , while RB offering income - generating opportunities for communities living RB . “ DT goal is to replant trees , to return DT Sahel to what PRP was about 60 NNS ago , when EX was a lot more forest cover , ” says anthropologist Gilles Boetsch , director of a French scientific team working with Senegalese researchers in DT region . EX are plenty of setbacks he says . JJ trees die and need to be replaced , while conflict in some Sahel NNS makes areas inaccessible . “ PRP does n’t work 100 percent , but PRP works , ” Boetsch says , adding a similar regional initiative MD RB work north of DT Sahara . “ DT first problem is NN . DT second is getting communities to accept DT projects . ” In North Africa , some national projects to fight NN NN are making a difference , and Tunisia will reportedly present a regional oases protection project at DT Madrid NN conference . Local farmers in northern Algeria are getting Mexican expertise to plant prickly pear , a cactus WDT offers a raft of nutritional and money - generating benefits and needs little rainfall . Algeria is RB trying to revive a massive ‘ Green Dam ’ reforestation project WDT previously had disappointing results . In Tunisia ’s southeastern Gabes region , Dhafer Guezguez worked with DT local NN in European Union - financed projects WDT included restoring oases and reintroduce native date palm species . DT plants are hardy and nutritious , he says , but not as sweet as popular commercial varieties . Attracting consumers will need serious marketing . “ PRP need to be showcased as a product WDT ’s rare and good for PRP , ” Guezguez says . “ DT same kind of effort PRP saw in Europe and DT NNP NNPS to VB NNS to eat organic products . ” DT oases preservation initiatives have helped to boost local economies and restore depleted soil , he says . Women dominate DT workforce . DT projects have continued even after EU financing ended . Participants are RB making tourist handicrafts IN palm leaf bags and hats , to earn extra revenue . “ I VBP this is how , little by little , PRP can save DT oases , ” Guezguez says . “ When local communities realize PRP ’s in their interest to do so .

text: Here PRP see swaddling clothes for DT baby - and a shroud for DT mother . Here PRP see a baby 's cradle connected tragically with a woman 's coffin . Here PRP hear a birth cry and a death gurgle at CD and DT same NN . DT dying mother 's last act was to name her child . " And she named DT child Ichabod . " And her last testimony was - as she thought upon DT ark of God being taken by DT Philistines - " DT glory is departed from Israel . " PRP was goodbye to glory ! " Let PRP make some applications of DT statement , even though PRP MD appear as those who carve epitaphs on tombstones , or as those who write obituaries , or as those who wailingly and discordantly participate in funeral dirges . Though PRP MD be asking PRP to look through old windows upon scenes which others have described , though PRP MD travel some well - worn and familiar trails , though PRP MD serve DT same food in somewhat different platters , still PRP make bold to ask PRP to remember IN ' tis true ' . A Nation NNP Lose Its Glory DT wife of Phinehas , passing through DT swirling waters of DT river of death , VBD : " DT glory is departed from Israel " Thoughtfully scanning DT pages of history , rubbing DT dust of centuries off DT tombs of some nations WDT underwent DT frightful processes of self - burial , PRP can give DT same testimonies concerning other nations . For 'tis true IN , warmed by DT sun which never loses its glory , a nation 's sun MD set in night . Under DT stars - stars which never lose their splendor a nation 's starry crown MD lose its brightness , being displaced by a withered wreath of poison ivy or a circle of undesirable cactus , or by DT brow becoming an eyeless , earless , tongueless , brainless skull . Beneath DT heavens which declare DT glory of God , even as DT firmament showeth His handiwork , a nation WDT circled DT clouds as a strong - winged eagle , can flutter among DT clouds as a broken - winged vulture or squawking parrot . Among DT flowery continents of God a nation can become a place of foul odours WDT make DT righteous stop their noses . [ Ancient Babylon ] Great was DT glory of Babylon of old ; but Babylon became a vermin- infested , animal - prowling jungle - Babylon , " DT glory of kingdoms , DT beauty of DT Chaldees ' excellency , " became " as when God overthrew Sodom and Gomorrah . " Something of DT tragic departure of its glory is told in these words : " PRP shall never be inhabited , neither shall PRP be dwelt in from generation to generation : neither shall DT Arabian pitch tent RB ; neither shall DT shepherds make their fold RB . But wild beasts of DT desert shall lie RB ; and their houses shall he full of doleful creatures ; and owls shall dwell RB , and satyrs shall dance RB . And DT wild beasts of DT islands shall cry in their desolate houses and dragons in their pleasant palaces : and her NN is near to come , and her days shall not be prolonged . " - Isaiah 13:20 - 22 . [ Ancient Carthage ] Great was DT glory of Carthage centuries ago . But her commanders became as impotent as skeletons of cattle scattered on desert sands . Her swift feet became as a cripple 's walk - her clenched fist as DT fumbling fingers of a paralytic . [ Ancient Syria ] Wondrous DT glory of Syria at a NN when Eleanor 's troubadours at Antioch bewitched DT Syrian air with ballads of DT South - and lightened DT horrors of DT second crusade . But Syria 's glory departed when DT following was VBN . " But this NNS hath a revolting and a rebellious heart ; PRP are revolted and gone . " - Jeremiah 5:23 . [ Ancient Greece ] Great was DT glory of ancient Greece - especially from 450 B.C. to 350 B.C. - under Pericles . But Greece became a moulded crust in history 's garbage heap . Greece had her Athens -- civilization 's queen . Plato was hers . Socrates was hers . A vast multitude of seers was hers . Phidias , raising beautiful NNS unto Athens from DT sterile womb of stone , marbled JJ places with sculptured wonders . DT Muses tented in her gates and plumed DT arts with eagle 's wings . At JJ shrines DT human brain bowed in reverence . But with all these persons , with all these things of beauty , Greece became a moulded crust in history 's garbage can . [ Ancient Rome ] Great DT glory of DT Rome of centuries far back and forever gone - especially from 50 B.C. to 60 A.D. - with her astute statesmen , with her close - meshed code of laws , with her sword - woven mantle , coin - embroidered , WDT fell on cities where merchants congregated and fattened on DT spoils of trade , with her armies WDT feasted and fattened on blood . Rome was mighty among DT kingdoms - mighty wherever ships and swords and thrones and lust of gold and sovereignty constituted DT boasted heritage of DT age . But Rome and her glory became as a mouth full of pyorrheic gums holding rotten teeth , all loose and foul . [ Ancient Nineveh ] Great DT glory of DT nation - JJ realm of Nineveh - with her winged lions symbolic of strength and speed . But Nineveh became as a vari-colored butterfly enmeshed and perishing in DT net of a relentless spider . [ Ancient Egypt ] Great DT glory of old ancient Egypt - DT land of DT Pharaohs - DT land of wealth and wonders . But PRP became a shabby sexton of splendid tombs - her torch of far - reaching splendor became a pot of smoke without CD spark of remaining radiance . [ Ancient Spain ] Great was DT glory of ancient Spain - back RB in DT glorious NNS beyond recall . Wide and strong was DT sway of her scepter . Her piratical ships harassed all DT seas and filled her coffers with gold . But this nation , with NN and conquests and caches of coin , with thrones and crowns and scepters , with laughter and love and lure , with men and money and might , with fervor and force and fruit , became as a drowsy and lousy and frowsy beggar watching a broken clock . [ Ancient Jerusalem ] And let PRP ask PRP to VB of Jerusalem - " beautiful for situation " - as representative of DT nation Israel . Triumphant were her temples . Her past " shines glorious as doth DT moon on midnight seas . " For favoured Jerusalem , kings kneeled down and prayed . For glorious Jerusalem , prophets , in tears and love , served . For beautiful Jerusalem , martyrs shriveled into flame . In Jerusalem 's virgin face were eyes in which , deep - folded , lay prophecies of DT Son of God . But because within her sacred courts evil was girt with diadem , Jerusalem hardened her heart . Jerusalem bloodied her hands . Jerusalem deafened her ears . Jerusalem played DT harlot . And Jesus described her then departing and afterward utterly departed glory in these words , " Thy house is left unto thee desolate . " Covered this blood - soaked NN with DT wreck of once - glorious cities . Scarred DT face of this war - blighted NN with DT ruin of once - glorious nations . Marred DT fair face of this NN with DT wreck of once - glorious civilizations - civilizations which have left behind them nothing but DT smoke of DT brilliant torch , nothing more than an empty name , nothing more than DT shadow of a shadow . What DT Bible says about some nations and some cities - representatives in large measure of once - proud , once - strong , once - influential civilizations - is true of other nations and cities of DT past and DT present : " For I have sworn by myself , saith DT Lord , IN Bozrah shall become a desolation , a reproach , a waste , and a curse ; and all DT cities thereof shall be perpetual wastes ... " RB Edom shall be a desolation . every CD WDT goeth by PRP shall be astonished , and shall hiss at all DT plagues thereof ... " And Hazor shall be a dwelling for dragons , and a desolation for ever ; EX shall no man abide RB , nor any son of man dwell in PRP . "- Jeremiah 49:13,17,33 . " This is DT rejoicing city WDT dwelt carelessly , DT VBD in her heart , I am , and EX is none beside me : how is she become a desolation , a place for beasts to lie down in ! every CD DT passeth by her shall hiss , and wag his hand . " - Zephaniah 2:15 . In America PRP must remember IN DT glory of a nation is righteousness and faith in God - and VBG DT way God points - and in such is our security against all foes , our immunity against DT ravages of NN . " For DT nation and kingdom WDT will not serve thee shall perish , yea , those nations shall be utterly wasted . " - Isaiah 60:12 . This sober truth WDT only righteousness exalteth a nation -- IN if ever America loses her faith in God she will have to come off her pedestal , IN pallbearers WDT carried other nations to their graves will do work for PRP if PRP forsake God and refuse to VB DT way He points -- was put upon our hearts once by DT editor of DT Watchman - Examiner in these words : " PRP should remember IN CD hundred NNS ago Germany was regarded as DT most Christian nation in Europe . Then came a day when innate conceit got to work . Christianity was emasculated . Christ was rationalized to be nothing more than a good man . DT Holy Scriptures were reduced to a crazy quilt . Religion came to be built on negatives . God was dwarfed and man was deified . ' Let DT strong survive , ' became DT JJ religion . Germany was decivilized and Hitler had no trouble getting his followers to arm to DT hilt to conquer DT NN . " Let PRP ask DT help of Almighty God in these days when men " loose wild tongues WDT hold not God in awe , " when EX are evils WDT MD lead our greatest graces to DT grave and leave DT NN no copy . When DT atheistic deformities of our times MD coerce PRP into substituting for Christianity 's vital bread a chunk of froth scattered by miasmatic winds - lest our country become a despised Ichabod among DT nations of NN . A Church NNP Lose Her Glory " Thy glory hath departed " Too bad and too sad when DT is spoken of a church about which glorious things once were spoken . ' Tis tragic , 'tis true IN of some churches such is DT epitaphic description of their decay , their inverted torch , their oil - less lamps , their turning back in DT day of battle - though armed and carrying bows . DT is grief for angels . DT is laughter for devils . DT is gloating for Satan . DT is groaning for Christ 's followers . A church can " leave its first love " DT church at Ephesus did - and needed to " repent and do DT first works " Revelation 2:4,5 . A church can VB from an army into an ecclesiastical nursery wherein DT preacher is looked upon as a head nurse who has more to do with milk bottles for sickly saints than with mighty battles against seductive Satan . Then does its glory depart . A church can VB from a church of compassionate concern into a church of callisthenic conventionality utterly devoid of devotional vitality - censorious of spiritual and far - sighted leadership , worldly , wayward , and peevishly puny . Then can Ichabod be written over its portals , its pews , its pulpit . A church can VB from a cataract of activity into a scum - covered pond of stagnation . Thus , forgetting IN " she IN liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth , " she hastens DT departure of her glory . A church can VB from a church of aggressive conquest into a church possessive of a slothful timidity , a passive acquiescence in small attainments , a criminal spineless in DT face of evils WDT arrogantly challenge , a careless in - difference to great stretches of DT unattained . Thus is Ichabod an appropriate adjective for its activities and aimlessness . A church can be a roller of marbles when PRP should be a remover of mountains . Thus does its spiritual muscle become flabby , its fingers fumbling , its feet halt - as DT glory departs . A church can put its headlight on DT rear and VB only of DT glory WDT was . Then and thus does its light grow dim , its voice faltering , its spiritual ambitions anemic , its worship boresomely lacking in life , its glory NN of DT past . Pathetic DT words WDT fell from DT Master 's lips . " And as he went out of DT temple , CD of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here ! And Jesus answering VBD unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? EX shall not be left CD stone upon another , WDT shall not be thrown down " Mark 13:1,2 . PRP were great buildings . PRP were magnificent stones . But to his eyes PRP were nothing more than ruins , for DT glory of DT temple 's worship and service had departed . " But DT Lord VBD unto Samuel , Look not on his countenance , or on DT height of his stature ; because I have refused him : for DT Lord seeth not as man seeth ; for man looketh on DT outward appearance , but DT Lord looketh on DT heart " - I Sam . 16:7 . Outwardly DT beautiful and stately temple seemed destined to " defy DT tooth of NN . " Inwardly PRP was hollow and empty and tottering to its fall . Write " Ichabod " upon PRP . Is PRP possible for a church , when God calls PRP to " launch out into DT deep " in DT matter of soul - winning , to become " a drifting sepulcher manned by a frozen crew ? " Well , when academic luster takes DT place of spiritual passion , when refrigeration is valued above conflagration , such is DT danger . I once heard Dr. Perry Webb say : " DT atmosphere in some churches is so cold , PRP can skate down DT aisles . " Is PRP true IN a church MD be noted for DT gorgeous architecture of its building , DT lovely music of its choir , DT stateliness of its ritual , DT fine - functioning of all its organizations , DT largeness of numbers as to its congregation , DT influence in JJ circles of business and social and educational life - and yet be , in DT eyes of Him who marks DT sparrow 's fall , as a corpse wrapped in an ornate shroud ? Of DT church at Sardis , Jesus , risen and enthroned , VBD : " And unto DT angel of DT church in Sardis write , These things saith he WDT hath DT seven Spirits of God , and DT seven stars ; I VBP thy works , IN thou hast a name WDT thou livest , and art dead . " - Revelation 3:1 . Somebody described another church IN unto DT church at Sardis in these words : Outwardly splendid as of old - Inwardly sparkless , void and cold - Her force and fire all spent and gone - IN DT dead moon she still shines on . R.T. Ketcham once VBD : " Attend church , but do not attend a church which prefers NN to Scripture , reason for revelation , theories for truth , culture for conversion , benevolence for blood , goodness for grace , sociability for spirituality , play for praise , pep for prayer , profession for possession , progress for power , reformation for regeneration , good for God , speculation for salvation , jubilation for justification , feelings for faith , paralysis for peace , politics for precepts . " To this I make additional comment saying IN a church deserves to have Ichabod written from its lowest cellar step to DT sky - touching point of its steeple which prefers DT adulation of saints to ardent anxieties concerning lost sinners as well as abhorrence of DT which is evil . Glory yields up its scepter - when DT fancies of literary notables have place along with DT facts of DT gospel , when EX is DT frivolity of DT flesh instead of DT fervor of DT spiritual in serving DT Lord - godliness in form only instead of glorying in DT cross of Christ - a groping after eternal verities - and a guessing IN only borders on godliness as to DT certainties of God 's promises instead of a guidance of others into paths of righteousness . Glory " packs its baggage for a CD - way trip " when in DT church NNS are noted for faultfinding instead of being notable for forgiveness - when offense is quickly taken and EX is overlordism instead of DT offering of self for lowly service - when DT making of money means more than DT mastery of money . How can DT glory of DT church be as a sunlit mountain whose position never changes when in DT church EX is playing at DT job and little praying on DT job - when peevishness and petulance predominate over praise - when EX is quarrelsomeness instead of quietness - when EX is frequent rumpus - raising and riotous revelry instead of restfulness , sinfulness instead of saintliness , selfishness instead of service , tattling instead of testimony , tampering with temptation instead of triumph over temptation . " Thy glory hath departed " will be written on NN and known in Heaven of DT church where EX is more yawning over watches than yearning over wanderers - where EX is mere zest and not zealousness in good works . Let PRP so live and give , so love and serve , so watch and pray , IN , if DT individual 's conduct were universalized , PRP MD never be as a hand WDT writes of a church , " Thy glory hath departed . " DT true glory of a church consists : " in DT purity of its members ; in its spiritual progress ; in DT unity of its fellowship ; in DT spiritual NNS born into its household of faith ; in its self - sacrificing spirit toward others ; and in DT prayer life of DT whole group . When a church is in a healthy condition hypocrisy will be limited ; progress in purity will be constant ; strife and discord will disappear ; sympathy for DT lost will seek means for their rescue ; recruits will outnumber DT losses from backsliding , removal , and death ; private devotion will be a pleasure , family religion a joy , and JJ worship a sought delight . " Along with this let PRP remember IN any church will undergo DT frightful processes of dishonorable self - burial where EX is a lax theology WDT advocates a mutilated Bible , a minimized sin , a deified man , a humanized Christ - substituting human opinions and speculations for DT revealed pronouncements of God concerning DT Bible , concerning DT nature of men , concerning DT terrors of sin , concerning DT deity of Christ , concerning DT meaning of Christ 's death on DT cross , concerning DT plan of salvation , concerning Hell , concerning Heaven . A Home MD Lose Its Glory Yet , glorious as DT glory of a real home is , DT glory can depart - sometimes does depart - assuredly will depart - if DT things " down under " Christian ideals , sordidly below Christian standards for a home - VB DT upper hand and put their oppressive heels upon DT virtues which MD weave wedding garments instead of shrouds on DT home loom . Are EX not JJ homes WDT are grindstones on which DT Devil sharpens his weapons of wickedness ? DT glory of a home departs when parents walk on DT edges of mental abysses - talking nonsense . DT glory of a home will assuredly leave a home as a flower wilts under heavy frost - when parents , by neglect or omission in spiritual matters , send NNS out to NN in paper boats , as though seas did not drown , - when parents , in matters momentous as to issue in stainlessness of morals , permit NNS , in daring defiance of Christian conduct , to walk bare - footed on live coals , as though fire did not burn . Today so JJ homes die in houses . Today JJ who VBP better , living for things WDT matter least , neglecting things WDT matter most , are content with houses in which EX are no homes . text: On April 30 , DT nation reported just four NNS , all of them travellers arriving from abroad , marking DT first day with zero local infections in two and a half months . As case numbers have continued to fall , DT NN has cautiously relaxed its guidelines , while signaling a shift to " everyday quarantine " measures , such as wearing masks and temperature checks at schools . NNS 's attitudes have RB relaxed , leading some officials to worry about complacency and a second wave of infections . DT nightclub outbreak MD heighten those fears , but DT NN has already responded aggressively , tracing and testing thousands of NNS in a matter of days . Last mile is DT toughest Though testing companies were quick to respond to DT demand , rolling out DT kits presented difficulties . Through February , demand for tests was still outpacing supply , and EX were only enough kits to distribute to a select number of hospitals . Furthermore , hospitals struggled to administer DT tests to potentially contagious patients safely and quickly — testing areas needed to be sanitised after each patient , long queues meant DT NN MD spread while NNS waited in line , and NN workers were running low on protective gear . At Yangji Hospital , this RB led to exhausted staff , says hospital director Sang Il Kim . " Even when PRP did have kits , DT waiting times were just too long for everybody to VB tested , so PRP MD have to VB to other hospitals , " adds Yoona Chung , a doctor in DT hospital 's surgery department . According to Yangji's data , DT hospital was conducting roughly 10 tests a day by late February — but JJ more were being turned away due to DT wait . Other hospitals in Korea started experimenting with drive - through testing centres , where patients MD VB tested without leaving their cars . But Yangji Hospital is near a subway station in a crowded neighbourhood in southern Seoul ; for JJ of its patients , cars are n't an option . So , Kim devised DT walk - in booths , which went into pilot operation on March 10 . Within days , DT number of tests administered in a day had tripled . text: Jeff Bradstreet , who has been described as a “ controversial NN researcher , ” has now become DT center of NN rumors after reports of his apparent suicide . His death is VBN to have followed on DT heels of a raid by DT NNP Food and Drug Administration ( FDA ) of his Bradstreet Wellness Center in Buford , Georgia ( update 27JUN2015 : DT Georgia Drugs and Narcotics Agency is reported to have aided in DT raid ) . A fisherman found Bradstreet ’s body in a North Carolina river on Friday , June CD . Authorities in Rutherford County , North Carolina , VBP IN he had a gunshot wound to DT chest , “ which appears to be self - inflicted , ” according to DT local newspaper , DT Gwinnett Daily Post . DT Post RB reports IN DT speculation has spread IN a NN through DT community of NNS who are mourning DT loss of a man whom PRP viewed as a courageous crusader against mainstream medicine and who believe , as Bradstreet argued , IN DT mercury in NNS causes NN ( DT evidence emphatically indicates otherwise ) . According to his website , Bradstreet , whose own son is autistic , embraced a number of unproven or untested interventions for NN , including using stem cells in an overseas NN he chronicles , and hyperbaric oxygen therapy , which DT FDA cracked down on in 2013 . He was known for his use of chelation therapy . As I ’ve written about here before , those who are attracted to NN theories to explain their NN have a tendency to see NN all around them . With DT death of Bradstreet , this tendency is emerging in force . A related fundraiser with DT title “ Finding out DT truth ” references an “ exhaustive investigation into DT possibility of foul play . ” At last look , DT funds raised were in DT low five figures . Some seem to VB IN DT location of DT wound suggests foul play , but about a fifth of suicides by gunshot involve a wound to DT chest . A handgun RB was found in DT river where Bradstreet ’s body was discovered . Studies of NNS who are prone to subscribe to NN theories indicate IN readers drawn to NN - related online NN tend to be more focused on what filters into their narrow , NN - oriented communities , reinforcing confirmation biases and adding fuel to DT conspiratorial machine . In DT NNP , “ conspiracist beliefs , ” which are widespread , correlate with being more likely to use alternative medicine and to shun mainstream medicine , even to DT point of being less likely to have an annual physical . Researchers call DT internet a “ natural medium ” for DT diffusion of NN theories , and DT rapidity with which this NN spread and took hold is no exception .

text: by Ashley AustrewPoliticians are n’t exactly known for being honest . NNP Nixon had DT Watergate scandal . NNP Bill NNP lied about his affair with Monica Lewinsky . And , in DT first two NNS Donald NNP was NN , DT Washington Post reported he ’s made over 8,000 “ false or misleading claims ” to DT American NN . Still , PRP is rare to see a headline declaring any NN or politician a liar . Why is DT ? First of all , what does PRP mean to lie ? DT noun and verb lie are both recorded in Old English by DT 900s . To lie is “ to speak falsely or utter truth knowingly , as with intent to deceive . ” More generally , to lie is “ to express what is false , convey a false impression . ” So , when a person lies , PRP are n’t just sharing false information , PRP ’re doing PRP with DT sinister intent of getting others to believe misleading information . If someone does this habitually , then PRP MD call them a liar , “ a person who tells lies . ” This word is RB attested to in DT 900s . Why do n’t journalists use DT word liar ? DT main reason why JJ journalists avoid accusations of lying is because PRP is difficult to determine CD key word in DT definition above : intent . If a lie is “ a false statement WDT is made with deliberate intent to deceive , ” then calling someone a liar means PRP VBP PRP are intentionally trying to mislead NNS . While JJ of PRP make DT assumption about politicians , PRP ’s different when PRP ’re a member of DT NN tasked with reporting DT NN — not your own conclusions about PRP . David Greenberg , a professor of history and NN studies at Rutgers University and a contributing editor at Politico , wrote in 2017 IN DT NN declaring DT NN a liar MD cross a serious line . DT ’s not to say IN PRP should never be done . DT latter is an inflammation of DT brain , which can cause permanent brain damage and even death . text: Measles , RB called rubeola , is a viral infection WDT 's CD of DT most contagious infectious diseases in DT NN . DT NN is marked by symptoms WDT are similar to a common cold , as well as a characteristic red rash . Between 2000 and 2010 , DT JJ incidence of measles decreased by 66 % and DT mortality caused by DT NN decreased 74 % , according to a report published in DT journal DT Lancet . Less than two decades ago , measles was almost wiped out in DT NNP NNPS , thanks to NNS . But recently , DT NN has had a resurgence . Globally , DT number of NNS has jumped 30 % due to NN hesitancy . More than 760 NNS of measles were reported in DT U.S. between Jan. 1 and NNP 3 , 2019 , according to Dr. Deepa Mukundan , a pediatric infectious diseases specialist at DT University of Toledo NNP Center in Ohio . This is up from 372 NNS over DT entire NN in 2018 and up from 120 NNS over DT entire NN in 2017 , according to DT Centers for NNP Control and Prevention ( CDC ) . How contagious is PRP ? Measles is caused by Measles morbillivirus , a NN in DT paramyxoviridae family . According to DT CDC , DT measles NN settles in DT nose and throat mucus of an infected person . When a person infected with DT NN coughs , sneezes or exhales , DT NN becomes airborne and can spread to other NNS . " DT NN can remain in DT air for significant periods of NN , " Mukundan told Live NNP . " PRP can VB DT measles just by being in a room where a person with measles has been , even up to 2 hours after DT person has left . " Indeed , DT NN is incredibly contagious — 90 % of NNS who are not vaccinated against measles will become infected if PRP share space with someone who has DT NN . " Another reason IN PRP is transmitted so effectively is because DT hallmark of measles , DT rash , only comes several days after someone is contagious , " VBD Dr. Jennifer Lighter , a pediatric infectious NN specialist at NNP York University Langone NNP . Therefore , infected individuals can spread DT NN for several days before realizing PRP 're ill . DT contagious period lasts about four days before and four days after DT rash appears . A person with measles is likely to infect between 5 and 18 unvaccinated NNS , according to a 2019 review published in DT journal Emerging Infectious Diseases . Most NNS of measles cause some combination of cough , runny nose , red eyes , high fever and tiny white to bluish spots in DT mouth , VBD Dr. Aileen M. Marty , a professor of infectious diseases at Florida International University 's Herbert Wertheim College of Medicine in Miami . As DT infection progresses , DT characteristic red rash will develop . DT rash typically looks IN large , red , flat splotches on DT skin . To test for measles , a doctor will examine DT patient for telltale symptoms , such as spots inside of DT mouth and DT skin rash . If DT doctor has any doubt , PRP MD order a blood test to confirm infection , according to DT Mayo Clinic . Almost all NNS require treatment by a doctor . " This is a NN where complications are common — complications such as ear infection ( acute otitis NN ) , diarrhea and dehydration , pneumonia , encephalitis and even death , " Marty told Live NNP . " In DT NNP NNPS , CD to three of every 1,000 infected persons will die from [ measles ] complications — which is better than in DT Third NNP , where as JJ as two to 15 per 100 infected persons die from measles and its complications . " Young NNS are much more susceptible to DT NN . According to DT Mayo Clinic , measles kills 100,000 NNS a NN , most under DT age of 5 . Pregnant women and those with a compromised immune system are RB at risk of severe complications . EX is no specific drug for treating measles . Instead , doctors treat DT symptoms . " This means PRP provide / advise hydration , antipyretics ( e.g. , acetaminophen ) for comfort and fever control , airway humidification in patients with respiratory tract involvement , " Marty VBD . Though not licensed in DT NNP NNPS for DT treatment of measles , some pediatricians have used Ribavirin , an antiviral medication , to treat severe pneumonia caused by measles , Marty added . To protect those who have been exposed to DT NN but have not been vaccinated , a doctor MD order a post - exposure NN . If given within 72 hours of exposure , DT NN MD prevent DT measles . Even if PRP does n't prevent DT NN , DT vaccinated patient will only have a mild case of DT measles , according to DT Mayo Clinic . Another way to protect at - risk individuals is to inject them with immune serum globulin ( antibodies or proteins derived from DT blood of donors with measles immunity ) within six days of exposure to DT NN . IN a NN , this treatment can prevent measles or make DT onset less severe . For JJ NNS , recovering from DT measles includes resting at home until DT symptoms subside . PRP is important for patients to drink plenty of fluids to replace fluids lost during fevers . PRP MD RB be helpful to use a humidifier to relieve congestion and to block out bright lights WDT MD bother sensitive eyes , according to DT Mayo Clinic . Once DT NN has run its course , DT person will be immune to DT NN . However , DT immune system MD be significantly weakened for up to 2 NNS after recovering from DT measles , according to Lighter . During this NN , NNS can be more susceptible to secondary viral and bacterial infections , which MD cause more complications than DT original measles infection . DT best way to prevent measles is by NN . DT CDC recommends 2 doses of DT NN ; DT first for those between 12 and 15 months of age and DT second for NNS between 4 and 6 NNS of age . DT NN is 97 % effective for those who receive both doses and about 93 % effective for those receiving CD . Getting DT proper vaccinations not only protects DT individual receiving DT NN , PRP RB protects those who cannot be vaccinated : those allergic to components of DT NN , those with a compromised immune system or those too young to receive DT NN . " NNS are CD of DT most effective tools PRP have to protect JJ NN and prevent deaths around DT NN , " VBD Dr. Scott Lillibridge , an infectious NN expert and professor at DT Texas A&M NNP NNP Center School of NNP NNP . About 94 % of DT U.S. population is vaccinated against measles , according to Mukundan , although EX are pockets of NNS who delay or refuse NNS . DT groups of unvaccinated NNS make PRP difficult to control DT spread of measles , she VBD . " All measles outbreaks in DT U.S. start either with a visiting international traveler infected with measles or from an unvaccinated U.S. resident returning from an international trip with a measles infection , " Mukundan VBD . DT infection is then spread to others in DT community who are unvaccinated . Most measles NNS occur in locations with groups of unvaccinated individuals , according to DT CDC . In 2000 , DT U.S. declared IN measles was effectively eliminated in DT country . But since then , DT NN has been making a comeback , likely due to anti-vaxxers . " DT antivax movement is a small percentage of DT population but PRP are loud and draw a lot of undue NN attention , " Lighter VBD . Anti-vaxxers are driven by emotion rather than DT NN behind DT NNS , she VBD . Modern opposition to NNS is largely fueled by religious beliefs and DT unwarranted concern IN NNS are somehow linked to NN , among other reasons , according to DT Measles & Rubella Initiative , a collaboration of DT NN 's largest NN organizations WDT aims to eliminate measles and rubella . Before DT measles NN approval in 1963 , an estimated 3 to 4 million NNS in DT U.S. contracted DT measles per NN , with 400 to 500 dying from complications , according to DT CDC . Introduction of DT NN led to a greater than 99 % reduction in measles NNS in DT U.S. A wealth of research has confirmed IN EX is no relationship between NNS and NN and has repeatedly validated DT safety of DT measles NN . " Protect yourself and your loved ones by making sure IN PRP are up to date on DT measles NN , " Mukundan VBD . " Prevention , meaning NN , is always better than cure . text: DT WHITE HOUSE Office of DT Press Secretary NNP NNP Unveils Millennium Initiative to Promote Delivery of Existing NNPS in Developing NNS and Accelerate Development of NNP NNPS In his NN of DT Union address , NNP NNP will call for concerted international action to combat infectious diseases in developing NNS . These diseases cause almost half of all deaths worldwide of NNS under age 45 , killing over eight million NNS each NN and orphaning millions more . DT NNP committed DT NNP NNPS to addressing this terrible problem in his September speech to DT NNP Nations General Assembly . Now DT NNP is asking for foundations , pharmaceutical companies , international agencies , and other governments to join PRP in this task , and he is announcing these specific elements of his Millennium Initiative : • A JJ financial commitment to purchase and deliver existing NNS in poor NNS . As Vice NNP Gore told DT U. N. Security Council earlier this month , DT Administration�s FY 2001 budget will include a proposed $ 50 million contribution to DT NN purchase fund of DT NNP Alliance for NNPS and Immunization ( GAVI ) . • Increased investments in NN in developing NNS . DT NNP is calling on DT NNP Bank and other multilateral development banks to dedicate an additional $ 400 million to $ 900 million annually of their low - interest - rate loans to expand immunization , prevent and treat infectious diseases , and build effective delivery systems for other basic NN services . These investments are as central to JJ progress as investments in education and physical infrastructure , and PRP MD build on DT JJ focus on basic NN services WDT PRP have supported as part of DT Highly Indebted Poor NNPS ( HIPC ) debt initiative . This proposed shift in existing resources does not require additional U.S. budget expenditures . • A significant increase in basic research on diseases WDT affect developing nations . DT Administration�s FY 2001 budget for DT National Institutes of NNP includes a sharp step - up in research critical to DT development of NNS for malaria , tuberculosis , and HIV / AIDS . • A JJ tax credit for sales of NNS for malaria , tuberculosis , and HIV / AIDS to accelerate DT invention and production of these NNS . Because developing NNS often cannot afford to buy NNS , DT market provides little incentive for pharmaceutical companies to develop NNS for diseases WDT disproportionately affect those NNS . This tax credit MD provide such an incentive , because every dollar paid by a qualifying organization to buy a qualifying NN MD be matched by a dollar of tax credits � representing up to $ 1 billion of additional funding for future NN purchases . DT NNP is calling on other governments to make similar purchase commitments , so IN PRP can ensure a future market for these critically needed NNS . Infectious Diseases Pose a Mounting Social and JJ Burden on Developing NNS � And a Threat to Our NN As Well . • More than eight million NNS die each NN of centuries - old diseases IN malaria , tuberculosis , and respiratory and diarrheal diseases . Deaths from DT modern scourge of AIDS are climbing rapidly . Altogether , as JJ NNS die of infectious diseases each NN as DT total number of combatants who perished in NNP War I . • In an interconnected and highly mobile NN , NN crises in other NNS are a threat to everyone . PRP have seen this with HIV / AIDS , with DT resurfacing of tuberculosis , and with DT outbreak last NN of West Nile encephalitis in NNP York . According to DT NNP NNP Council , during DT past 50 NNS , at least five times as JJ Americans have died from communicable diseases WDT have come from DT developing NN than have died in military conflicts . NNS Are CD of DT Most Cost - Effective Ways to Improve DT Well - Being and Productivity of DT Poorest NNS � And Medicines and Other Basic NN Services Are a Necessary Complement . • PRP costs about $ 17 to immunize a child , but millions of NNS die each NN of diseases WDT MD be prevented by existing NNS . Indeed , NNS in developing nations are 10 times more likely to die of a NN - preventable NN than NNS in developed nations . And these tragedies occur in spite of DT enormous efforts of UNICEF and others to vaccinate NNS , which save 3 million lives each NN . • Highly effective NNS do not yet exist for malaria , TB and AIDS , which take over 5 million lives each NN . But developed nations have DT scientific and technological capacity to make JJ NNS possible . For example , recent work on genetic sequencing , including DT human genome , will open vast possibilities . • Another NN investment with very high returns is simple preventive and curative services . Providing this basic NN care together with NNS MD save millions of lives each NN . A $ 50 Million Contribution to GAVI to Buy NNS For NNS � Which Will Save Lives Now and Create Confidence WDT a Market for JJ NNS Will Exist in DT Future . • GAVI , DT NNP Alliance for NNPS and Immunization , was formed as a collaborative effort of UNICEF , DT NNP NNP Organization ( WHO ) , DT NNP Bank , private foundations , bilateral aid agencies ( including DT U.S. Agency for International Development ) , industry representatives , and developing NNS . GAVI established DT � NNP Fund for Children�s NNPS � with an initial grant of $ 750 million over 5 NNS from DT Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation . DT formal launch of GAVI , and DT official announcement of DT Gates gift , will occur shortly in Davos , Switzerland . • A U.S. contribution will help to purchase NNS for Hepatitis B , Haemophilus Influenzae B ( Hib ) , and Yellow Fever , along with related safe delivery equipment such as auto - destruct syringes . To ensure IN GAVI�s NN purchases complement , rather than replace , existing NN efforts , PRP will be conditional on a country achieving 50 percent coverage of DT DTP ( diptheria - tetanus - pertussis ) NN , which is included along with measles and polio in DT existing EPI ( Expanded Program for Immunization ) . • A U.S. contribution will hopefully catalyze significant contributions from other NNS and foundations . PRP will RB add crucial credibility to DT international community�s commitment to provide a market for JJ NNS when PRP are developed . PRP Must Shift Existing International Resources Toward Building NNP Infrastructure in Poor NNPS WDT Can Deliver NNS and Medicines and Provide Essential Basic NNP Services . • DT NNP Bank and other multilateral development banks ( MDBs , such as DT African Development Fund ) lend money on highly favorable terms to DT world�s poorest NNS . Today , roughly $ 1 billion to $ 1 - 1/ 2 billion of this so - called � concessional funding � is devoted to NN care each NN . DT Administration proposes to increase DT amount by $ 400 million to $ 900 million per NN , with a focus on : • prevention of diseases using basic measures such as information and condoms for AIDS , treated bed nets for malaria , and stronger systems for containing TB ; • treatment of diseases , including common respiratory and diarrheal infections ; and • DT Administration is exploring ways to use DT HIPC debt reform to support this part of DT Millennium Initiative . CD possibility is to make an increase in NN rates CD of DT performance targets monitored in DT HIPC progress reports . This MD be accompanied by debtor NNS � agreements to include specific improvements in NN delivery systems as priority uses of debt relief proceeds . PRP RB expect IN all Poverty Reduction Strategy Papers WDT are prepared for HIPC candidates will discuss DT adequacy of budget resources and suggested policy reforms devoted to basic NN care . • This re-direction of resources supports DT Administration�s overall strategy for JJ development , which emphasizes poverty reduction and gives a central role to �global JJ goods � � IN NN or DT environment � in which positive actions taken in CD country benefit other NNS as well . To meet this objective , these funds should not come from spending on other basic social programs , such as education and NN care . • This aspect of DT Millennium Initiative does not require a JJ budgetary commitment by DT NNP NNPS ( or other donor NNS ) . However , DT U.S. ability to influence DT direction of MDB lending and DT use of HIPC proceeds depends crucially on meeting our existing commitments to these aid programs . PRP will work with other G - 8 finance and development ministries to refine this proposal . • A conservative estimate suggests IN if basic NN care including immunization were made broadly available , up to 2 million children�s lives MD be saved each NN . Higher Funding for Basic Scientific Research Through DT National Institutes of NNP ( NIH ) and Elsewhere Will Hasten DT Development of NNS for Malaria , TB , and AIDS . • DT Administration�s FY 2001 budget for NIH includes a significant increase in research critical to creating NNS for these diseases . For malaria and TB , this increase will build on recent advances in DT genetic sequencing of these diseases , which have set DT stage for major breakthroughs in NN development . • Funding for NIH malaria NN research will increase more than 10 percent over DT FY 2000 level . Future research will range from pre-clinical studies aimed at improving our understanding of DT malaria parasite , through DT development of NN candidates , to clinical trials judging NN efficacy and safety . NIH will RB expand its collaboration with NNS in malaria - endemic regions , especially in Africa , to strengthen those regions � capacity for conducting clinical trials of malaria NNS in DT future . • NIH research on a tuberculosis NN will receive over 40 percent more funding than in FY 2000 and more than double DT FY 1999 level . NIH will focus on studying DT body�s defense mechanisms against TB , and developing and studying NN candidates . Through its Tuberculosis Research Unit , NIH supports an international multi-disciplinary team to translate advances in basic research into JJ tools for fighting TB . • NIH funding for AIDS NN research will increase substantially in FY 2001 and will have more than doubled since FY 1997 . These additional resources will allow NIH to accelerate basic research on developing NN candidates and to significantly expand testing of potential NN candidates in both developing and developed NNS . DT JJ NNP Research Center on DT NIH campus , which will be occupied this summer , will receive a sizeable increase in funding for DT development and pre-clinical testing of HIV NN candidates . • DT Administration is providing strong support for DT path - breaking research on infectious diseases being conducted by U.S. military NNS , including DT opening ( in October 1999 ) of DT Walter Reed Army Institute of Research / Naval NNP Research Center . text: DT U.S. NN alone spends $ 200 million a NN on a hunt for a NN against AIDS . At DT forefront of DT search stands Dr. David Baltimore , chairman of DT National Institute of Health's AIDS NNP Research Committee . Currently NN of DT California Institute of Technology as well , Baltimore won DT 1975 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine . Betsey Arledge , producer of DT NOVA film " Surviving AIDS , " interviewed a cautiously optimistic Baltimore on DT current NN of DT search for a NN . NOVA : Can PRP give me a sense of DT magnitude of DT AIDS epidemic at this NN ? Baltimore : DT AIDS epidemic in this country is a serious issue , but it's not a major JJ NN disaster DT way PRP is abroad . In DT NN today EX are something IN 34 million infected NNS , and more NNS are being infected every minute . On DT scale of any JJ NN issue in DT NN , this is CD of DT major ones . EX are more NNS dying of AIDS than of almost any other infectious NN , with tuberculosis and malaria being in DT same ballpark . PRP 's a horrendous situation . ( See AIDS in Perspective . ) NOVA : Do PRP VB PRP 're getting a little complacent in this country ? Baltimore : I 'm impressed IN AIDS remains a very noted NN in DT NNP NNPS . PRP 's noted in DT newspapers all DT NN — what 's VBG on in DT NN and in DT country . EX is very complete coverage of how good DT drugs are and where DT NN program stands . I do n't VB PRP 've allowed PRP to fall off DT radar screen . And PRP do far more AIDS research than DT whole rest of DT NN ; in DT NN area alone , PRP do probably 90 percent of DT research . " She was wrong about DT , but PRP shows IN from DT very first moment a NN was on NNS 's minds . Indeed , EX has been a significant effort to make a NN from DT very first day . Most viruses PRP fight off very well , including polio and even smallpox . A certain fraction of NNS MD be maimed or killed by those viruses , but DT much larger fraction of NNS VBP over them . DT 's not true for H.I.V . PRP knew DT from very early on . At first PRP thought PRP might be IN JJ NNS MD be killed by PRP , and then PRP began to realize IN almost everybody who had DT infection was potentially VBG to be killed by PRP . DT 's fundamentally different than other viruses . And DT fundamental difference was a red flag . DT initial impetus WDT we'd be able to do PRP , PRP 's around DT corner , was just all wrong . DT next question became : Where do PRP turn ? What 's not obvious ? What can PRP do ? DT involved bringing a whole different level of NNS into DT discussion . Not DT ordinary NNS who make NNS , but NNS whose scientific focus is in other areas of immunology , of infectious NN — basic NNS . However , PRP tells PRP a lot about why HIV is so hard to counter . PRP is not a NN WDT is native to DT human species , and therefore PRP is continually mutating in an effort to adapt . Most human viruses are well - controlled by DT human immune system , because PRP have evolved with PRP , and DT two opposing forces are in a steady - NN . text: A JJ trial has begun in Victoria this week to evaluate a potential NN against NNP - CD . DT NN is called NVX - CoV2373 and is from a NNP biotech company , Novavax . DT trial will be carried out across Melbourne and Brisbane , and is DT first human trial of a NN specifically for NNP - CD to take place in Australia . This NN is actually based on a NN WDT was already in development for influenza . But how might PRP work against SARS - CoV - 2 , DT NN WDT causes NN - CD ? Read more : MD BCG , a 100 - NN - old NN for tuberculosis , protect against NN ? NNS trigger an immune response by introducing DT cells of our immune system to a NN in a safe way , without any exposure to DT pathogen itself . All NNS have to do two things . DT first is make our immune cells bind to and “ eat up ” DT NN . DT second is to activate these immune cells so PRP ’re prepared to fight DT current and any subsequent threats from DT NN in question . PRP often add molecules called adjuvants to NNS to deliver a danger signal to DT immune system , activate immune cells and trigger a strong immune response . Read more : Revealed : DT protein ' spike ' WDT lets DT 2019 - nCoV NN pierce and invade human cells DT Novavax NN is what PRP call a “ subunit ” NN because , instead of delivering DT whole NN , PRP delivers only part of PRP . DT element of SARS - CoV - 2 in this NN is DT spike protein , which is found on DT surface of DT NN . By targeting a particular protein , a subunit NN is a great way to focus DT immune response . However , protein by itself is not very good at binding to and activating DT cells of our immune system . Proteins are generally soluble , which does n’t appeal to immune cells . PRP VBP something PRP can chew on . So instead of soluble protein , Novavax has assembled DT SARS - CoV - 2 spike protein into very small particles , called nanoparticles . To immune cells , these nanoparticles look IN little viruses , so immune cells can bind to these pre-packaged chunks of protein , rapidly engulfing them and becoming activated . DT Novavax NN RB contains an adjuvant called Matrix - M. While DT nanoparticles deliver a modest danger signal , Matrix - M can be added to deliver a much stronger danger signal and really wake up DT immune system . DT Novavax NN for SARS - CoV - 2 is based on a NN DT company was already developing for influenza , called NanoFlu . DT NanoFlu NN contains similar parts – nanoparticles with DT Matrix - M adjuvant . But PRP uses a different protein in DT nanoparticle ( hemagglutinin , which is on DT outside of DT influenza NN ) . In October last NN , Novavax started testing NanoFlu in a phase III clinical trial , DT last level of clinical testing before a NN can be licensed . This trial had 2,650 volunteers and researchers were comparing whether NanoFlu performed as well as Fluzone , a standard influenza NN . Read more : Where are PRP at with developing a NN for NN ? An important feature of this trial is participants were over DT age of 65 . Older NNS tend to have poorer responses to NNS , because immune cells become more difficult to activate as PRP age . This trial is ongoing , with volunteers to be followed until DT end of DT NN . However , early results suggest NanoFlu can generate significantly higher levels of antibodies than Fluzone – even given DT older NNS in DT trial . Antibodies are small proteins made by our immune cells which bind strongly to viruses and can stop them from infecting cells in DT nose and lungs . So increased antibodies with NanoFlu should result in lower rates of infection with influenza . These results were similar to those released after DT phase I trial of NanoFlu , and suggest NanoFlu MD be DT superior NN for influenza . So DT big question is – will DT same strategy work for SARS - CoV -2 ? DT JJ phase I / II trial will enrol around 131 healthy volunteers aged between 18 and 59 to assess DT NN ’s safety and measure how PRP affects DT body ’s immune response . Some volunteers will not receive DT NN , as a placebo control . DT rest will receive DT NN , in a few different forms . DT trial will test two doses of protein nanoparticles – a low ( 5 microgram ) or a high ( 25 microgram ) dose . Both doses will be delivered with Matrix - M adjuvant but DT higher dose will RB be tested without Matrix -M . All groups will receive two shots of DT NN 21 days apart , except CD group WDT will just VB CD shot . This design enables researchers to ask four important questions : • None can DT NN induce an immune response ? • None if so , what dose of nanoparticle is best ? • None do PRP need adjuvant or are nanoparticles enough ? • None do PRP need two shots or is CD enough ? Read more : NN anti-vaxxers are n’t a huge threat yet . How do PRP keep PRP DT way ? While PRP ’s not yet clear how DT NN will perform for SARS - CoV - 2 , Novavax has reported PRP generated strong immune responses in animals . And PRP VBP NanoFlu performed well and had a good safety profile for influenza . NanoFlu RB seemed to work well in older adults , which MD be essential for a NN for NN - CD . PRP eagerly await DT first set of results , expected in a couple of months – an impressive turnaround NN for a clinical trial . If this initial NN is successful , DT phase II portion of DT trial will begin , with more participants . DT Novavax NN joins at least nine other NN candidates for SARS - CoV - 2 currently in clinical testing around DT NN .

text: James Jeffrey " Jeff " Bradstreet ( July 6 , 1954 – June CD , 2015 ) , was an American doctor , alternative medicine practitioner , and a former preacher [ 2 ] who ran DT International Child Development Resource Center in Melbourne , Florida , [ 3 ] a JJ practice in Buford , Georgia [ 4 ] and in Arizona , where he practiced homeopathy . [ 5 ] [ 6 ] He RB founded DT Good NNP Doctor Foundation , which aimed to combine Christian beliefs with his JJ practice . [ 7 ] Bradstreet obtained a Florida JJ license in 1984 . He received a Bachelor of NNP degree from DT University of South Florida in 1976 , where he RB went to JJ school beginning three NNS later . His postgraduate research focused on aerospace medicine , and he received his training in this field from Wilford Hall NNP Center . He was an adjunct professor of child development and neuroscience at DT Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine in Tempe , Arizona . [ 8 ] Bradstreet published NN research , which he claimed indicated NNS as a cause , in DT Journal of American Physicians and Surgeons , which is not indexed by PubMed . This research claimed IN autistic NNS had a higher body burden of mercury , [ 9 ] and IN three autistic NNS had measles RNA in their cerebrospinal fluid . [ 10 ] DT Institute of Medicine has rejected any relationship between NNS and NN . [ 11 ] Bradstreet treated an autistic child named Colten Snyder ( CD of DT test NNS in DT NN omnibus trial ) with chelation therapy on DT premise of removing mercury from his body , in spite of DT fact IN hair , blood , and urine tests had failed to show he exhibited abnormal levels of mercury . [ 12 ] Over an eight - NN period , Colten visited Bradstreet 's office 160 times . [ 13 ] Stephen Barrett has stated , " PRP appears to me IN Bradstreet decides which of his nonstandard theories to apply and records diagnoses WDT embody them , " and describes Bradstreet 's mercury provoked tests as " phony " . [ 12 ] Peter Hotez characterized Bradstreet 's proposal to treat NN with chelation therapy as " dangerous . " [ 6 ] In an interview with DT Chicago Tribune , Bradstreet defended DT use of intravenous immunoglobulin ( IVIG ) as an NN treatment , saying , " Every kid with NN should have a trial of IVIG if money was not an option and IVIG was abundant . " [ 14 ] Bradstreet RB published research regarding DT use of hyperbaric oxygen therapy for NN , [ 15 ] some of which concluded PRP was ineffective , [ 16 ] as well as a paper arguing IN autistic NNS have an increased vulnerability to oxidative stress . [ 17 ] Further treatments Bradstreet used on autistic NNS included DT controversial protein GcMAF , with which he claimed to have treated 600 NNS . [ 18 ] In an article for an anti-vaccine magazine , Bradstreet endorsed stem cell therapy as an NN treatment . [ CD ] Bradstreet was found dead from a gunshot wound to DT chest in DT Broad River in Rutherford County , North Carolina in June 2015 , after his Buford , Georgia JJ office was raided by DT FDA in connection with an investigation into GcMAF treatments . [ 4] [ 20 ] [ 21 ] At DT NN of his death , he lived in Braselton and ran his JJ practice in Buford . [ 4 ] While DT police ruled Bradstreet 's death a suicide , several family members and anti-vaccine activists claimed he was murdered in connection with his criticism of NNS . [ 22 ] Bradstreet 's son is autistic , which Bradstreet attributed to a NN his son received at age 15 months . text: Measles NNS have spread across DT NNP this NN , with DT NN of NNP York now facing its worst outbreak in decades . Since last autumn , more than 150 NNS have been recorded in Rockland County , a NNP York suburb home to a large ultra-Orthodox Jewish community where EX has been some resistance to vaccinations . DT vast majority of NNP NNS allow families to opt out of getting vaccinated if PRP object on religious grounds and parents seem to take advantage of these rules . Researchers have found IN broad philosophical and religious exemptions to NN requirements are associated with higher rates of unvaccinated NNS . But this NN ’s outbreaks are now raising JJ NN questions about why NNS allow such exemptions . Here is how religious exemptions work : What is a religious exemption to a NN , and which NNP NNPS have them ? Religious exemptions allow parents to opt their NNS out of mandated NN policies if PRP object to DT NN for religious reasons and if PRP follow DT NN ’s opt - out process . Almost every NN , plus Washington DC , allows for a religious exemption beginning at least in kindergarten . Four NNS do not : California , West Virginia , Mississippi and Arizona . Each NN has its own rules regarding vaccinations for NNS who attend JJ schools . In addition to DT religious exemption , all 50 NNS , plus Washington DC , allow exceptions for JJ reasons . Examples include a child who has a condition IN cancer or an immune disorder where a NN MD be harmful to DT child ’s NN . And more than a dozen NNS offer philosophical exemptions , sometimes known as personal - belief exemptions , which do not require IN a parent ’s desire to opt out be specifically about their religious beliefs . Instead , PRP can include exemptions for conscience or moral ideology . California , West Virginia and Mississippi , which do not allow religious exemptions , RB do not allow philosophical objections . How are religious exemptions connected to DT recent NNP measles outbreak ? DT measles outbreak in DT NNP York suburb of Rockland County has largely been cantered in an ultra-Orthodox Jewish community , where EX has been some recent resistance to vaccinations . NN rates tend to be low among DT ultra-Orthodox , and DT reasons vary , from fear of interference from outsiders to confusion over accurate religious and JJ information . DT current flare - up in NNP York and NNP Jersey , both of which allow religious exemptions , can be traced back to DT measles outbreaks in Israel last NN . Because ultra-Orthodox parents often send their NNS to their own religious schools , DT outbreak was initially largely contained . But PRP has recently spread significantly . Some Orthodox Jewish schools have been allowing unvaccinated NNS to attend school , against DT NNP York NNP Department ’s mandate , during DT measles outbreak . How are NNS a religious issue for some NNS ? Some NNS worry IN vaccinating interrupts a divine plan for someone ’s life , and PRP do not VB to interfere in God ’s will . Others have concerns IN some NNS MD violate religious dietary laws , unless PRP are designated kosher or halal . Last NN an influential Islamic group in Indonesia issued a controversial fatwa , which was later overturned , against DT measles - mumps - rubella , or MMR , NN , citing its use of porcine gelatin . And JJ of those who oppose abortion object to certain NNS , IN those designed to prevent chickenpox or hepatitis A . Those NNS are made by growing viruses in fetal embryo fibroblast cells , or cell lines WDT are grown in laboratories but are derived from two elective abortions in DT 1960s . A Catholic family in Kentucky , for example , has filed a lawsuit against DT Northern Kentucky NNP Department for banning unvaccinated students from school and athletics during a chickenpox outbreak at their son ’s Catholic school . Are DT recent measles outbreaks causing some NNP NNS to reconsider exemptions ? To an extent , yes . NN exemptions for NNS enrolled in kindergarten have slowly grown over DT past decade , according to DT Centres for NNP Control and Prevention ( CDC ) , prompting some NNS to consider changes . California got rid of its non-medical exemptions in 2015 . A few NNS WDT allow religious exemptions have made them more difficult to VB , requiring things IN a signed affidavit from a religious leader instead of simply filling out an online form . NN lawmakers , often Republicans , around DT country introduced more than 150 bills from 2011 through 2017 WDT MD have made PRP easier to obtain exemptions from NN policies . But according to a NN in DT American Journal of NNP NNP published in January , DT 13 bills signed into law actually limited DT ability to exempt . Some professional organisations have RB taken action . DT American Association of Pediatrics has made DT elimination of non-medical NN exemptions its top priority this NN , even ranking PRP above family separations at DT border . Are religious leaders doing anything to address DT issue ? Yes . Rabbis and doctors organised a JJ NN campaign to stress DT importance of NNS . DT Orthodox Union and DT Rabbinal Council of America have strongly urged parents to vaccinate their NNS . “ PRP is well known IN those facing even a potential life - or - death situation are instructed to set aside DT Sabbath and other key tenets of halachic ( Jewish law ) observance until DT emergency has passed , ” PRP VBD in November . Elsewhere , local NN and community leaders have stressed open communication between NN officials and religious leaders to bridge cultural divides . In Colorado , Dr Joshua Williams , an assistant professor of pediatrics at DT University of Colorado Denver School of Medicine , has recommended IN DT groups talk at specific times , such as when DT academic NN begins or at DT start of influenza season , and not just during a NN crisis . He is RB working with DT NN ’s Council of Churches to hold sessions with parishioners to hear their concerns . “ Religious vaccinations exemptions impact JJ NN , ” Dr Williams VBD . “ EX is a need to dialogue with religious leaders around NN exemptions at local and national levels . ”
